According to legend, when Odette, the thirteenth generation scion was born, swans flocked to the castle to pay their respects. Princess Odette is said to have a contagious smile, leading people to say she is a goddess in human form. In order to match the praise that people have piled on her, Windor mastered the most difficult of noble magic. 

Despite being universally admired, Odette was lonely until chance brought her to Lancelot, whose wounds had led him to faint on the lakeshore. During Lancelot's recovery, the two soon developed a deep unconditional love.

skills.name: Lakeshore Ambience
skills.des: After casting a skill, Odette's next Basic Attack or Skill will also cast a sound wave that rebounds between enemies, dealing 144~200<font color='#27C0C7'>(+50% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font>.

skills.name: Avian Authority
skills.des: Odette concentrates energy to summon a swan to attack enemies, dealing 250<font color='#27C0C7'>(+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> and slowing them by 70%. Lasts 2s.

skills.name: Blue Nova
skills.des: Odette fires a magic energy ball forward, dealing <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies and immobilizing them for 2s. After the ball has reached either its Max range or hit a target, two extra energy balls will strike out to the sides, dealing 250<font color='#27C0C7'>(+50% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> and immobilizing them for 2s.

skills.name: Swan Song
skills.des: Odette gathers energy and deals Continuous Damage to enemies within the area. Deals 240<font color='#27C0C7'>(+120% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies every 0.5s. Lasts 5s. The field also enhances rebounding speed and number of rebounds of <font color='#404495'>(Lakeshore Ambience)</font>. Reduces damage taken by 50% while active. Slows enemies by 90%, which decays over time. Lasts 2s.

equipments.name: Enchanted Talisman
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mana Spring:Regenerates 12% of Max Mana every 10s in total.

equipments.name: Genius Wand
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Magic:Dealing damage to enemy heroes will reduce 3~10 points of their Magic Defense (Scales with level). This effect lasts 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equipments.name: Glowing Wand
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Scorch:Skill Damage will burn targets for 3s, dealing 1%/1.75%/2.5% of the target's Max HP as Magic Damage per second. (10 damage minimum).

equipments.name: Divine Glaive
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Spellbreaker:When HP is higher than 70%, the unique bonus effect is increased by 30%

equipments.name: Blood Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Nirvana:Adds 1.5 HP for every 1 pt of magic power added.

hero.name: Argus
hero.head: miya/hero/head/7535ba676553a6001e8b38009163b4e6.png
hero.tale:
The Moniyan Empire of the Land of Dawn once enjoyed the blessings of angels. The Angel of Light, Rafaela, shone down on the people and healed all of their illnesses; the Angel of Dark, Argus, became the punisher of crime. Together they maintained peace and balance throughout the land.

Rafaela and Argus were originally angelic partners who operated with a tacit understanding. Though Argus was in charge of punishment and possessed an extreme personality, he still established the Temple of Light to show the people of the realm that there was more to the world than war and conflict; that kindness, comfort and encouragement should also fill their lives. As such, he did not always resort to punishment and death while managing the affairs of the empire. As time passed, those who Argus had to punish increased in both evilness and strength. In order to face these opponents, it was necessary for him to become increasingly stronger himself. But even Argus was late to realize that he had become addicted to the rush of defeating strong enemies in battle. He had once acted purely to punish those who sinned, but now sought only his own strength and glory. It was in this way that Argus fell from grace.

Argus' situation had long been watched by the Lord of the Abyss, who intentionally caused crimes that pushed Argus further into his corruption. He promised Argus that using dark powers would increase his strength, and in order to win himself such a strong servant even baited Argus with knowledge of an ancient seal of power. Completely driven by his lust for power, Argus broke the ancient seal and released from within it the evil sword Demise. Argus fell completely under the Abyss Lord's control, acting as his most loyal servant.

Legend states that the user of the sword Demise will be drained of all lifeforce until taken by death. Consumed by his desire for power, Argus sacrificed his life to the blade and coexists with it in dark equilibrium. He hungers for battle and chaos, thirsts for worthy opponents who can satisfy his taste for combat. He is an angel whose blade blackens souls.

The Angel of Light Rafaela has never stopped searching for him. She knows that the corruption of an angel is far worse than the corruption of any man. In each of her attempts to heal the corruption and desire in Argus' heart, she is inevitably attacked and chased away. Faced with the new Argus, a stranger to his former self, she cries tears of regret. Argus, however, holds nothing back in his attacks against Rafaela. The redemption of the Angels of Dark and Light will influence the fate of the realm.

skills.name: Warmonger
skills.des: When Argus takes or deals damage, the blade is empowered. The lower Argus's HP is, the faster his blade charges. When fully charged, his next Basic Attack hits twice rapidly and slightly slash towards enemies.

skills.name: Demonic Grip
skills.des:
Argus puts out a demonic hand at the designated direction, dealing 125<font color='#D58E1F'>(+60% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to an enemy hero and moving to the front of the target. If this skill fails to hit an enemy hero, he will pull himself to the location. 
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again)</font>: If this skill hits a target, Argus makes an extra slash towards the enemy that he captures, dealing 175<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.

skills.name: Meteoric Sword
skills.des: After a short period of charging, Argus strikes enemies with his demonic blade, dealing 450<font color='#D58E1F'>(+130% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> slowing them by 80%. Lasts 0.8s. The demonic blade curses the injured enemy for 5s. Enemy under curse leaves a curse trail that grants Argus extra Movement Speed while he is moving on it.

skills.name: Eternal Evil
skills.des: Argus transforms into a fallen angel, clearing all his debuffs. Meanwhile, he recharges his blade once and becomes immune to death for 5s. The time he's  controlled is decreased by 25%. 100% of damage dealt during the skill's duration will be converted to Argus's HP after skill effect ends.

equipments.name: Scarlet Phantom
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Frenzy:Crit hits increase the hero's ATK Speed by 30% and Crit Chance by 5%. Lasts 2s.

equipments.name: Demon Hunter Sword
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Devour:Basic attacks will deal 9% of the target's current HP as additional physical damage (up to 60 against creeps and minions).
Unique Passive-Devour:Each Basic Attack grants 4% Physical Lifesteal for 3s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equipments.name: Berserker's Fury
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Doom:Crit hit will increase the hero's Physical Attack by 5% for 2s.

equipments.name: Hunter Strike
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Retribution:Deals damage to an enemy hero or Creep for 5 times in a row and improves Movement Speed by 30% for 3s. This effect has a CD of 15s.

equipments.name: Blade of Despair
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

hero.name: Grock
hero.head: miya/hero/head/ffba34135c3b8b788aa5ce3f8ea4c589.png
hero.tale:
Deep within the mountains of the Land of Dawn sits an ancient fortress. Though the owner is unknown, it is rumored that it could be a descendant of the legendary race that once walked the Lands of Dawn. It said that this race is older than the earth itself, and having a special affinity for nature, they were able to build deep connections and relations with various beings of nature, especially the Stone Titans. 

These amiable giants possess rocky skin that is almost impervious to all physical force, but due to their kind nature, they mainly use their physical prowess to sleep safely. These stony giants love sleeping so much that they will hibernate for up to half a year sometimes, however once they are awakened, it is hard for them fall asleep again. One day when Grock awoke again, he found himself to be alone with the guardians of the fortress long gone. He proceeded to saddle the fortress onto his back to find the owners, setting out all over the Land of Dawn to find any news of their whereabouts, so he may one day return their home to them.

skills.name: Ancestral Gift
skills.des: When Grock is near a wall or turret, his Movement Speed will be increased by 10%, Physical and Magic Defense by 15<2|lv 8> and HP Regen by 15<2|lv 8>.

skills.name: Power of Nature
skills.des:
Grock raises weapon to sweep nearby enemies, dealing 300<font color='#D58E1F'>(+40% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and slowing them by 40%. Lasts 2s. Damage scales with charge time. 
Stay near to a wall while casting <font color='#404495'>(Power of Nature)</font> to become immune to Crowd Control effects.

skills.name: Guardian's Barrier
skills.des: Grock releases a shockwave towards a designated location, dealing 300<font color='#D58E1F'>(+50% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. Then the shockwave becomes a stone wall that blocks enemies for 5s.

skills.name: Wild Charge
skills.des: Grock charges forward, dealing 300<font color='#D58E1F'>(+50% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies on the path. Hitting a wall or a turret allows him to deal 600<font color='#D58E1F'>(+150% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the nearby enemies and reduce the CD of this skill by 30%.

equipments.name: Dominance Ice
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Arctic Cold:Lowers movement speed 10% and lowers attack speed 30% for nearby enemy heroes.

equipments.name: Tough Boots
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Fortitude:Reduces time controlled 30%

equipments.name: Cursed Helmet
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Success:Success

equipments.name: Antique Cuirass
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Success:Success

equipments.name: Oracle
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Bless:Raises shield absorption and HP regeneration effects by 30%.

equipments.name: Guardian Helmet
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Recovery:Regenerates 1.5% of hero's Max HP. Eliminating enemy heroes raises regeneration rate by 0.4%, while assists raises the rate by 0.2% (includes eliminations and Assists prior to purchase), up to 3.5%. This effect wears off after 5s of the hero taking damage.

hero.name: Irithel
hero.head: miya/hero/head/e62c4a019949199fe10815b98cc56c0a.png
hero.tale: Irithel was abandoned in the jungle by her parents when she was a little girl. Under the guidance of the God of Jungle, a female smilodon that had just given birth adopted her. Being protected by the mother smilodon, the little smilodon Leo and Irithel learned to hunt, survive, and grew up like an animal. During a territory fight, the mother smilodon was badly injured. When Irithel and her "brother" Leo went to a town for help, they were captured as "smilodon children" by a slaveholder. When the cat elf mage - Nana - passed by and couldn't watch them get beaten to death, she suddenly had the super power inside her that allowed her to save these two poor children. With the help of Nana, Irithel was able to understand human languages and combat skills while Leo grew up to become a strong adult smilodon. But Irithel still hates humans and trusts her only friend - Leo.

skills.name: Jungle Heart
skills.des: Irithel and Leo know each so well that allows her to shoot while moving. Each basic attack shoots out 3 heavy arrows(it takes a while to reload the heavy bow), each arrow deals 42% points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>(Only the first arrow can trigger equipment passive abilities).

skills.name: Strafe
skills.des: Irithel shoots a round of arrows, dealing 250<font color='#D58E1F'>(+60% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the enemies in the area and reducing their Physical Defense by 15 for 3s.

skills.name: Force of The Queen
skills.des: Leo shouts loudly, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>(+60% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the enemies in the area and slowing them by 80% for 2s.

skills.name: Heavy Crossbow
skills.des: Irithel controls Leo to jump forward and equips a heavy crossbow, after which her Basic Attack will deal 80<font color='#D58E1F'>(+126% Total Physical ATK)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to a target and nearby enemies for 15s.

equipments.name: Haas's Claws
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Insanity:When HP drops below 40%, the hero will receive extra 10% Physical Lifesteal.

equipments.name: Scarlet Phantom
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Frenzy:Crit hits increase the hero's ATK Speed by 30% and Crit Chance by 5%. Lasts 2s.

equipments.name: Berserker's Fury
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Doom:Crit hit will increase the hero's Physical Attack by 5% for 2s.

equipments.name: Malefic Roar
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Armor Buster:Basic Attack will ignore 20% of a Turret's Defense.

equipments.name: Blade of Despair
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

hero.name: Harley
hero.head: miya/hero/head/d9bb884028a4bed92ffbba24a2cd7d25.png
hero.tale:
There lived a famous young mage, Harley, in the Lion Academy of Magical City. He is blessed by the Magical Goddess and as the star of the Academy, he is able to learn quickly and master any magical spell. 

Kids need adventure and when Harley and his friends were exploring the jungle in the middle of the night, they overheard the evil conspiracy of the organization called the "Dark Wizards." The brave young men decide to stop them! First, they need to find the secret base of Dark Wizards and then report to the headmaster. But during the investigation, he accidentally activated the space portal and teleported to the other side of the Land of Dawn - Scholar City. 

With the help of the mecha master - Rooney, the brave and energetic boy and his partners Lolita, Bruno, Alpha and Saber, they went back to the Magical City to destroy the core of Demorte, the Boss of Dark Wizards. To improve his battle techniques, Harley started his adventure in the Land of Dawn.

skills.name: Magic Master
skills.des: As a magic master, his basic attack deals 60<font color='#D58E1F'>(+50% Total Physical ATK)</font> <font color='#27C0C7'>(+60% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font>.

skills.name: Poker Trick
skills.des: Harley shoots 3 rounds of cards forward, dealing 150<font color='#27C0C7'>(+25% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> on first enemy hit by the cards (Damage decays when the same target is hit by 3 times or more) and increasing his Attack Speed by 5% on each hit. Stacks up to 8 times. Lasts 3s.

skills.name: Space Escape
skills.des:
Harley blinks to the designated direction, leaving a magic hat at his place, increasing his Movement Speed by 30% for 2s. 
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again)</font>: Use again in 4s to return to where the hat is.

skills.name: Deadly Magic
skills.des: Harley shoots a magic fire ring to a designated enemy hero (can be blocked by other heroes), dealing 200<font color='#27C0C7'>(+60% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magical Damage)</font> and slowing the enemy by 40%. Lasts 1.5s. Generates a huge fire ring around the enemy for 4s. Harley can deal damage by hitting the fire ring with his skills. At the end of its duration, the ring deals 100<font color='#27C0C7'>(+30% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font>, plus 50% of damage taken by the target during the skill's duration.

equipments.name: Enchanted Talisman
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mana Spring:Regenerates 12% of Max Mana every 10s in total.

equipments.name: Genius Wand
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Magic:Dealing damage to enemy heroes will reduce 3~10 points of their Magic Defense (Scales with level). This effect lasts 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equipments.name: Concentrated Energy
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Recharge:Kill enemy hero to recover HP by 10%.

equipments.name: Divine Glaive
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Spellbreaker:When HP is higher than 70%, the unique bonus effect is increased by 30%

equipments.name: Blood Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Nirvana:Adds 1.5 HP for every 1 pt of magic power added.

hero.name: Gatotkaca
hero.head: miya/hero/head/622d77876b971f28c568c169b00b17d7.png
hero.tale: Gatotkaca 'The Iron Bone' was the son of Bima and Arimbi from the Arcapada universe. Since his childhood, he's been a champion of Gods who fights the vicious enemies of his homeland. Once lost and beaten near death, Gatotkaca arose as a mighty warrior from the Pandava clan who possessed a supernatural power he got from the ultimate training within the cauldron of heaven, Candradimuka. With his Antakusuma armor and Brajamusti-Brajadenta twin gauntlets, he can fly across the skies like lightning and hunt down his enemies, the furious Ashuras. Gatotkaca, the Knight of Priggadani is a symbol of bravery and devotion. Based on 'Garudayana' comic series created by Is Yuniarto, inspired from Indonesian traditional shadow puppets.

skills.name: Steel Bones
skills.des: Gatotkaca converts 3% of his lost HP to Physical Defense, up to 250. Dealing damage to enemies who have higher HP than him regenerates 110~250 HP (Increases with level) plus HP equal to 0.5x of his Physical Defense. This effect can only trigger once every 6s.

skills.name: Blast Iron Fist
skills.des: Gatotkaca shatters the ground in front of him, dealing 190<font color='#27C0C7'>(+90% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font>. Deals 30<font color='#27C0C7'>(+20% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> per second to enemies trapped in Gatotkaca's shattered area and slows them by 40%.

skills.name: Unbreakable
skills.des: Gatotkaca charges and loudly shouts towards a designated direction, taunting enemies to attack him and deals 90<font color='#27C0C7'>(+60% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font>. The taunt duration is determined by how long Gatotkaca charges this skill. Taunt lasts for up to 1.3s. Within the first 2.5s of casting this skill, Gatotkaca reflects damage upon nearby enemies and deals up to 90 plus 1.5% of his Max HP points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font>.

skills.name: Avatar of the Guardian
skills.des:
Gatotkaca jumps to the designated area, knocking nearby enemies into the air for 1s and dealing 500<font color='#27C0C7'>(+300% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font>. Enemies near the center of the area will be knocked into the air for a longer duration. Enemies on the fringes will be pulled to the center. 
Camera will follow the Skill Indicator but will not provide extra view.

equipments.name: Cursed Helmet
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Success:Success

equipments.name: Tough Boots
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Fortitude:Reduces time controlled 30%

equipments.name: Blade Armor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Vengeance:Deals 25% of opponent's physical attack as physical damage to an attacker when a basic attack is received.

equipments.name: Antique Cuirass
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Success:Success

equipments.name: Immortality
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Immortal:Resurrect 2s upon death and get 15% HP and a shield that can absorb 300~1000 points of damage. (Scales with hero level) Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a CD of 180s.

equipments.name: Guardian Helmet
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Recovery:Regenerates 1.5% of hero's Max HP. Eliminating enemy heroes raises regeneration rate by 0.4%, while assists raises the rate by 0.2% (includes eliminations and Assists prior to purchase), up to 3.5%. This effect wears off after 5s of the hero taking damage.

hero.name: Karrie
hero.head: miya/hero/head/8f9c682f83ff4d15baec5fba4b195166.png
hero.tale: Alaghat is a mysterious technique empire. There lives a strange humanoid race - Yasson. They are in human form while having a pair of deformed feet. They are agile and born to fight. They are also good at techniques that allow them to create a significant civilization and to invade others. Since Karrie was a child, she was very talented and trained into an excellent and arrogant warrior leader. But at the same time, she lost her feelings and became a machine. During one battle, she was overconfident and got seriously injured. But a prophet from another race saved her and injected his consciousness into her brain. Since then there has been a voice in her head; the prophet told her that the ruin of her empire is about to come and there will be no Yasson anymore. After her escape from death, Karrie didn't believe the voice in her head. But she started to suspect it was right after returning to her empire. In order to save her empire, and for her own redemption, Karrie chose to believe and came to the Land of Dawn. What kind of destiny is waiting for her?

skills.name: Lightwheel Mark
skills.des: Karrie adds a <font color='#404495'>("Lightwheel Mark")</font> to enemies with each Basic Attack or Skill. When <font color='#404495'>("Lightwheel Mark")</font> stacks to 5 marks on a target, the mark becomes actual lightwheels, piercing the target and dealing <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font> equal to 7%-13% of target's Max HP. Damage against Creeps is no more than 300.

skills.name: Spinning Lightwheel
skills.des: Karrie releases flywheels and deals 200<font color='#D58E1F'>(+90% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> on the path. When the flywheels go to the end, they deal 100<font color='#D58E1F'>(+20% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to nearby enemies and slow them by 80% continuously. Lasts 1s.

skills.name: Phantom Step
skills.des:
Karrie moves towards a designated direction while releasing a lightwheel to the most nearby enemy, dealing 150<font color='#D58E1F'>(+70% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and adding <font color='#404495'>("Lightwheel Mark")</font>. 
After entering Dual Wield Mode, she will release 2 lightwheels.

skills.name: Speedy Lightwheel
skills.des: Karrie enters Dual Wield Mode. Within the next 6s, Her Movement Speed will be increased by 20%. Releases 2 lightwheels on each Basic Attack, but each Basic Attack only deals 50% damage and her Attack Speed is reduced by 20%.

equipments.name: Demon Hunter Sword
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Devour:Basic attacks will deal 9% of the target's current HP as additional physical damage (up to 60 against creeps and minions).
Unique Passive-Devour:Each Basic Attack grants 4% Physical Lifesteal for 3s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equipments.name: Golden Staff
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Swift:Unable to increase critical chance. Every 1% of critical chance gained will increase attack speed by 1%.
Unique Passive-Endless Strike:Normal basic attacks add a stack of Endless Strike. After accumulating 2 stacks of Endless Strike, the effect of the next basic attack is triggered 3 times.

equipments.name: Corrosion Scythe
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Corrosion:Basic Attack has 50% probability of slowing the enemy unit by 30%. Long-ranged Basic Attack only slows enemies by 15%.
Unique Passive-Impulse:When each Basic Attack deals damage to enemies, increase Attack Speed by 8%. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 3s.

equipments.name: Blade of Despair
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

equipments.name: Malefic Roar
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Armor Buster:Basic Attack will ignore 20% of a Turret's Defense.

hero.name: Roger
hero.head: miya/hero/head/8f5d0e8f8a33e3e4dbbcb92f4d218207.png
hero.tale:
Roger lives outside the Black Forest in the east of the Megalith Wastelands. He was once an upstanding soldier of the empire whose greatest strength and weakness was his stubbornness. After leaving the army he became an experienced hunter who earned a living with his trade. Many dangerous animals live in the Black Forest. The most terrifying of these are not the rare magical beings but the hundreds of wolves led by Pale Tusk, the new Wolf King. They use their skills in group tactics to attack in packs, and Pale Tusk himself has awakened magic abilities within him with the help of an ancient power. In order to satisfy their need for food, the wolves began to appear outside the borders of the Black Forest where they would attack travelers passing by.

Motivated by his sense of justice, Roger decided to remove this threat to the common people. He followed Pale Tusk's tracks and discovered the wolves had surrounded a small village in preparation to attack. Suddenly a wolf's howl broke the silence, and the pack of wolves rushed in and attacked all the inhabitants of the village. Just as Pale Tusk was about to feast on an injured little girl, Roger used his hunting instincts to launch an attack and save the girl, whose name was Ruby. Roger succeeded in pushing back Pale Tusk and his wolves but was injured by the Wolf King in the battle. Roger mimicked the language of the wolves to warn Pale Tusk to leave the village. The retreating Pale Tusk looked back at the bloodied Roger, a look of enmity in his eyes. Unable to forget the fear that pierced his heart that day, Roger began to worry that Pale Tusk would come back for revenge. He began to train Ruby in how to fight wolves. During this training, his body began to change. He knew these changes were somehow related to Pale Tusk. For the safety of the others, Roger left the village in secret.

When Roger returned to his home, he slowly realized that the ancient power Pale Tusk carried had begun to infect his own body. "Even one of a pure heart, one who misses not once his nightly prayers, is helpless to resist the lupine transformation in the dark grass under a moonlit sky." On the night of a full moon, Roger was horrified to discover that the legend was true as he transformed into a werewolf. In order to avoid hurting others in his deranged transformed state, he had no choice but to leave his home.

skills.name: Full Moon Curse
skills.des: In human form, Roger's Basic Attack slows enemies down by 20%. In wolf form, his Basic Attack deals extra damage that equals to 5% of enemies' lost HP (Up to 60 extra damage to Creeps).

skills.name: Open Fire
skills.des:
Roger rapidly shoots twice, dealing 300<font color='#D58E1F'>(+120% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> in total. 
The first Hunter Net slows enemies by 80%. Lasts 1.5s. 
The second one reduces Physical Defense of enemies by 10. Lasts 5s.

skills.name: Hunter's Steps
skills.des: Roger increases his Movement Speed by 50% for 2.5s.

skills.name: Wolf Transformation
skills.des:
Roger lunges forward and turns into a wolf, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and slowing enemies by 90%. Lasts 0.8s. 
<font color='#404495'>(Passive)</font>: In Wolf form, Roger increases 40 points of Physical and Magic Defense and increases his Movement Speed by 40.

equipments.name: Demon Hunter Sword
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Devour:Basic attacks will deal 9% of the target's current HP as additional physical damage (up to 60 against creeps and minions).
Unique Passive-Devour:Each Basic Attack grants 4% Physical Lifesteal for 3s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equipments.name: Golden Staff
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Swift:Unable to increase critical chance. Every 1% of critical chance gained will increase attack speed by 1%.
Unique Passive-Endless Strike:Normal basic attacks add a stack of Endless Strike. After accumulating 2 stacks of Endless Strike, the effect of the next basic attack is triggered 3 times.

equipments.name: Queen's Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Demonize:Reduces damage taken by 50% when health is less than 40% and increases your Physical Lifesteal by 30%. Lasts 5 seconds. This effect has a 50 second cooldown.

equipments.name: Blade of Despair
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

equipments.name: Malefic Roar

hero.name: Vexana
hero.head: miya/hero/head/58c6aef5e0fa7a1f67884c88d2c3e7ef.png
hero.tale:
A long, long time ago, there was a small country with a kind and caring king and queen, held in high esteem by their subjects. Under the protection of the King of Light, they lived a peaceful life. But deep underground, the Dark Lord of the Abyss was plotting to invade their land. The Dark Lord sent the enchanting vampire queen, Alice, to seduce the king. The king stopped attending court and no longer cared for his once beloved queen or kingdom. 

The king's betrayal razed the queen's sanity in flames of jealousy, and in an attempt to win back her husband's heart, she made a deal with the Dark Lord to regain her youth and beauty. Every day in the kingdom, another young and beautiful maiden went missing, and a panic fell over the people. The country grew weaker with each passing day, and the sacrifices demanded by the queen's sorcery grew as well. Finally, the kingdom collapsed, with no more sacrifices to be found, and the devouring power of darkness suddenly caused the queen to become a wizened and frightening monstrosity. 

A thousand years have passed, and this unknown kingdom has since disappeared in the winding river of history, leaving only the legend of the demon queen. Very few today connect this tale with the great and terrible Necromancer Vexana in the Land of Dawn. After all, it happened so very long ago.

skills.name: Necromancy Spell
skills.des:
Vexana adds <font color='#404495'>("Necromancer")</font> to targets who take damage from her. Lasts 5s. While the spell lasts, the target will explode upon death, dealing 220~500<font color='#27C0C7'>(+50% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to surrounding units (Basic Damage increases with level). 
Vexana summons puppets to attack enemies and will also add  <font color='#404495'>("Necromancer")</font> on them.

skills.name: Charmed Specter
skills.des: Vexana unleashes phantom power forward, dealing 250<font color='#27C0C7'>(+60% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> and fearing enemy heroes. Lasts 1s.

skills.name: Nether Snare
skills.des: Vexana summons an curse power to deal 500<font color='#27C0C7'>(+200% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to a specified location.

skills.name: Cursed Oath
skills.des:
Vexana puts a curse on an enemy hero, dealing 250<font color='#27C0C7'>(+80% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font>. Curses the target continuously within 8s and and deals 75<font color='#27C0C7'>(+20% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> (It can't be Purified). 
If a target dies while under the curse, or the curse's duration comes to an end, Vexana will summon a puppet in the form of the target, which will follow her into battle. Puppets inherit 70% of the target's attributes, and continuously deal 5% of the puppet's Max HP as <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to surrounding enemies. Puppets last 20s.

equipments.name: Enchanted Talisman
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mana Spring:Regenerates 12% of Max Mana every 10s in total.

equipments.name: Lightning Truncheon
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Resonate:Every 6s, next Magic Skill deals extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies that scales with hero's Max Mana.

equipments.name: Holy Crystal
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mystery:Increases Magic Attack by 21%~35% (Scales with level).

equipments.name: Divine Glaive
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Spellbreaker:When HP is higher than 70%, the unique bonus effect is increased by 30%

equipments.name: Blood Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Nirvana:Adds 1.5 HP for every 1 pt of magic power added.

hero.name: Lapu-Lapu
hero.head: miya/hero/head/805158c7e7c136fe30a7af58d1818e35.png
hero.tale:
The mysterious waters to the south of the Land of Dawn are dotted with islands big and small. Here the land is fertile, the climate mild. Life thrives, and food is in abundance. People live lives of peace and happiness. But one day, a group of invaders came upon this peaceful land and disrupted the happy lives of the people. 

The chief of Makadan Island, Lapu-Lapu, refused to become anyone's slave. "The enemy has iron spears. We have brave hearts," he declared. Lapu-Lapu took up his twin blades and led his people into battle, slaying countless invaders. Under his leadership, they won victory and the respect of the enemy, free once again to live in peace. But this incident of "outside invaders" made our hero aware of the world beyond the island, and though beset by enemies, he packed his bags and began a journey to learn about this world.

skills.name: Hero's Faith
skills.des: Lapu-Lapu will gain a stack of <font color='#404495'>("Bravery Blessing")</font> after hitting an enemy hero or a Creep with his skills. After gaining 5 stacks, Lapu-Lapu's next Basic Attack will deal extra 250% damage(not Critical). It will also give Lapu-Lapu a shield that absorbs 500~1200 points of Damage. (Scales with level)

skills.name: Justice Blade
skills.des: Lapu-Lapu hurls two boomeranging blades of light forward. Each blade deals 120<font color='#D58E1F'>(+50% Extra Physical ATK)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit on their way out and back, and multiple hits on the same enemy only grant 1 stack of <font color='#404495'>("Bravery Blessing")</font>.

skills.name: Brave Stance
skills.des:
Lapu-Lapu charges with his twin blades, dealing 100<font color='#D58E1F'>(+50% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies on the path. 
 If he hits an enemy hero, his Movement Speed will be increased by 30%. Lasts 3s.

skills.name: Chieftain's Rage
skills.des: Lapu-Lapu combines twin blades into one heavy sword and slashes forward, dealing 400<font color='#D58E1F'>(+200% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies, stunning them for 0.8s. He then increase 30 Physical and Magic Defense of his own within 15s. Lapu-Lapu enters Heavy Sword state and enhances all his skills. Lasts for 15s.

equipments.name: Blade of the Heptaseas
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Ambush:Next Basic Attack will deal extra Physical Damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack if no damage taken or dealt within 5s.

equipments.name: Rose Gold Meteor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Lifeline:Success

equipments.name: Malefic Roar
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Armor Buster:Basic Attack will ignore 20% of a Turret's Defense.

equipments.name: Immortality
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Immortal:Resurrect 2s upon death and get 15% HP and a shield that can absorb 300~1000 points of damage. (Scales with hero level) Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a CD of 180s.

hero.name: Aurora
hero.head: miya/hero/head/03dd15fbcf65a099d5e90fd912a9ab77.png
hero.tale:
Aurora, born in a windstorm and with a great power of controlling ice and snow, is the queen of the northernmost land - Northern Vale. Although they are all from this northernmost land, Aurora never had any interest in the conflicts between Franco and Bane. She was born powerful and extraordinary. As one of the four Guardians of the Land of Dawn, she performs all her responsibilities of protecting the world, protecting its border, and ensuring its safety from the spacetime rifts and monsters. 

During a horrible plain fight, Aurora lost one arm, along with her guardian knight. After this experience, the young queen became solemn and cold, silent and full of sorrow. When she rides on the wind to travel, there's only snow and ice keeping her company.

skills.name: Pride of Ice
skills.des:
Each time her skill is cast, one unit of frost energy will be added to Aurora. When 4 units of frost energy are collected, the next damage of her skill will <font color='#404495'>(Freeze)</font> the target. Lasts 1.5s. 
Aurora deals 30% increased damage to targets in <font color='#404495'>(Frozen)</font> status with her skills.

skills.name: Frost Shock
skills.des: Aurora fires a Frost Energy Missile. Upon hitting enemies, it will detonate and deal 300<font color='#27C0C7'>(+130% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> and slow enemies by 25%. Lasts 1.5s.

skills.name: Bitter Frost
skills.des: Aurora deals 530<font color='#27C0C7'>(+180% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> at designated target and slow the target by 80%. Lasts 1.5s.

skills.name: Cold Destruction
skills.des: Aurora summons a giant icy rock to bombard a designated target location, and all enemies hit will take 900<font color='#27C0C7'>(+180% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> and be slowed by 90%. Lasts 1.5s. Surrounding enemies of the target will also take 450<font color='#27C0C7'>(+90% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> and slowed down by 60%. Lasts 1.5s.

equipments.name: Lightning Truncheon
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Resonate:Every 6s, next Magic Skill deals extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies that scales with hero's Max Mana.

equipments.name: Demon Shoes
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mysticism:Eliminations of enemy heroes and assists regenerates hero’s mana by 10%, while eliminating minions regenerates 4% of the hero’s mana.

equipments.name: Fleeting Time
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Timestream:After an elimination or an assist, the CD of the hero’s ultimate is immediately reduced by 30%.

equipments.name: Holy Crystal
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mystery:Increases Magic Attack by 21%~35% (Scales with level).

equipments.name: Divine Glaive
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Spellbreaker:When HP is higher than 70%, the unique bonus effect is increased by 30%

equipments.name: Blood Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Nirvana:Adds 1.5 HP for every 1 pt of magic power added.

hero.name: Hilda
hero.head: miya/hero/head/760e5567e3f9ad782ec0766ca977f34d.png
hero.tale:
On the barren Megalith Wastelands, all one can see are the giant rocks and the sparse bushes, but this desolate land is where Hilda and her people call home. The land's infertile soil required everyone in the clan to become a good hunter in order to acquire precious meat. Born with great strength, Hilda soon became the leader of the hunting party and led her people to harvest great amounts of food. 

However, an unknown power in their territory drove wild animals into a frenzy and it became more and more difficult to hunt. Eventually, crazy beasts started to attack the clan. As the patriarch's premonition of a crisis started to become a reality, Hilda was forced to search for new habitats. With the hopes and dreams of the tribe on her back, she headed to the Land of Dawn. With her rich hunting experience, she became a mercenary of great reputation and expertise. Her only wish is to find a new home for her people and to fight for their future.

skills.name: Blessing of Wilderness
skills.des:
Hilda regenerates 2% of her max HP every second in the bush. When entering the bush she gains a shield equal to 10% of her max HP for 5s. This effect has a 10s cooldown.
When Hilda's HP drops below 30%, she regenerates 30% of her Max HP over 5s. This effect has a 120s cooldown.

skills.name: Combat Ritual
skills.des: Hilda activates the runic power of the great sword, increasing her Movement Speed by 60% for 3s and enhancing her next Basic Attack: It deals 200<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and slows the target by 70% points. Lasts 3s. It also deals 120<font color='#D58E1F'>(+60% Total Physical ATK)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies behind the target.

skills.name: Art of Hunting
skills.des: Hilda locks onto an enemy target, each time dealing 170<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. Skill can be released 3 times at most. The 2nd attack will deal damage to target's surroundings, and the 3rd attack will knock back the target and surrounding enemies temporarily.

skills.name: Power of Wildness
skills.des:
Hilda jumps toward the target and slashes powerfully, dealing 700<font color='#D58E1F'>(+200% Extra Physical ATK)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and temporarily stunning the target. Nearby enemies also take 60% of this skill damage. 
Each kill or assist enhances <font color='#404495'>("Power of Wildness")</font>, increasing its <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> by 40, stacking up to 10 times. Damage will be increased by 80 and ignore 60% of the target's Physical Defense at full stacks.

equipments.name: Warrior Boots
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Valor:Physical defense will go up 5 with each basic attack received, for an increase of up to 25 points. Lasts 3 seconds.

equipments.name: Cursed Helmet
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Success:Success

equipments.name: Antique Cuirass
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Success:Success

equipments.name: Athena's Shield
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Shield:Get a shield of 170~1150 points every 30s. Shield absorption amount grows as the match goes on.

equipments.name: Immortality
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Immortal:Resurrect 2s upon death and get 15% HP and a shield that can absorb 300~1000 points of damage. (Scales with hero level) Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a CD of 180s.

hero.name: Estes
hero.head: miya/hero/head/ebd453c03a1517b8666b697ee8fabf42.png
hero.tale:
At the habitat of moon elves, somewhere west of the Moonlake, lies the legendary Emerald Woodland, which was the birthplace of the first generation of elves. Every elven king was born in the Tree of Life at the center of the Emerald Woodland. 

The elven king of the current generation is the unique Estes, who was badly hurt during the second plain war and had to go into a deep sleep in the Emerald Woodland. Moon elves lost the guidance from their king ever since that day. When the flames of wars between humans and orcs burned on this peaceful woodland, the young Moonlight Archer, Miya, stood up and gathered the rest of the elves to protect their homeland. 

However, the dominator of dark abyss is thirsty for more believers and the dark force has been growing stronger in secret. Seduced by the Blood Queen, Alice, some young elves have fallen. The race of moon elves was once again at stake which outraged the great elven king! During a night of great thunder and lightning, Estes woke up. He's strict but benevolent,and empowered with the strength of the sacred moonlight to protect his people and to support his allies. With the Code of Moonlight in his hands, he swore to repel every enemy who dares to violate his homeland.

skills.name: Scripture of the Moon Elf
skills.des: Code of Moon Elves will charge energy into Estes slowly. When it stacks up to 100, it will improve his next Basic Attack, dealing 250<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Total Physical ATK)</font><font color='#27C0C7'>(+150% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to the target. The damage will ricochet, dealing 125<font color='#D58E1F'>(+50% Total Physical ATK)</font><font color='#27C0C7'>(+75% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 60%. Lasts 1.5s.

skills.name: Moonlight Immersion
skills.des:
Estes restores 200<font color='#27C0C7'>(+70% Total Magic Power)</font> points of HP for the target hero immediately and links himself with the target for 3s, restoring 325<font color='#27C0C7'>(+30% Total Magic Power)</font> points of HP for the target slowly. Linking with an ally will also improve his own Attack, and increase the energy charging speed of the Code of Moon Elves. (Scales with the number and the attributes of allied heroes.) 
Being too far from the target will break the link.

skills.name: Domain of Moon God
skills.des: Estes drops a flood of moonlight upon the designated area, dealing 350<font color='#27C0C7'>(+70% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemy units within it. Afterwards, it turns to a domain of Moon Goddess. Enemies will be slowed down by 90% when they touch the barrier of the domain area. Lasts 1.5s. (This Slowing Effect will disappear slightly with the time.)

skills.name: Blessing of Moon Goddess
skills.des: Estes will immediately cast enhanced <font color='#404495'>("Moonlight Immersion")</font> to all allied heroes nearby. Enhance <font color='#404495'>("Moonlight Immersion")</font> within 8s. Meanwhile, he will regenerate 1260<font color='#27C0C7'>(+105% Total Magic Power)</font> points of HP continuously.

equipments.name: Courage Mask
skill_tips: Active Skill-Encourage: Increases Movement Speed of the hero and nearby allied heroes by 30%. Also increases Physical & Magic Attack by 20%. Last 3s. The CD is 80s. This effect prevents hero from benefiting from Conceal and Encourage again in 80 s.
Unique Passive-Bravery:Increases 10% of Physical & Magic Attack, 10% of Physical & Magic Defense and 50% of HP & Mana Regen for nearby allies.

Unique Passive-Devotion:Obtain 2 EXP and Gold every 4s. In the first 12 minutes of the match, this equipment makes you gain nothing from Minions or Creeps if there are teammates without Roaming Equipment, or those with but have higher EXP or Gold than yours around you. They will share the whole EXP or Gold.

Unique Passive-Thriving:Gains extra 35% Gold and EXP with Assists. When your Gold ranks the 5th in your team, increase Gold you gain to 20 per 4s. When your EXP ranks the 5th in your team, increase EXP you gain to 35 per 4s.

equipments.name: Demon Shoes
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mysticism:Eliminations of enemy heroes and assists regenerates hero’s mana by 10%, while eliminating minions regenerates 4% of the hero’s mana.

equipments.name: Enchanted Talisman
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mana Spring:Regenerates 12% of Max Mana every 10s in total.

equipments.name: Dominance Ice
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Arctic Cold:Lowers movement speed 10% and lowers attack speed 30% for nearby enemy heroes.

equipments.name: Athena's Shield
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Shield:Get a shield of 170~1150 points every 30s. Shield absorption amount grows as the match goes on.

equipments.name: Guardian Helmet
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Recovery:Regenerates 1.5% of hero's Max HP. Eliminating enemy heroes raises regeneration rate by 0.4%, while assists raises the rate by 0.2% (includes eliminations and Assists prior to purchase), up to 3.5%. This effect wears off after 5s of the hero taking damage.

hero.name: Cyclops
hero.head: miya/hero/head/72336534bf50b08779fae7e4688e98c4.png
hero.tale:
Cyclops is a giant with only one eye but at least he is in his own homeland. Cyclops was obsessed with stars and skies when he was little. He watched all days and nights and discovered the truth that planets were moving all the time. And this kind of movement contains unbelievable magic power. With an hourglass full of this power, and the ability to control this power, he became the famous 'Starsoul Magician' in his homeland. 

Planetary movements will never stop, making Cyclops extremely powerful and invincible. However, this realization made him feel quite lonely. One day, Cyclops arrived on the Land of Dawn during his space travel and he found, much to his surprise, that there were many strong opponents waiting for him to defeat. 'I come, I see, I conquer!' said Cyclops.

skills.name: Starlit Hourglass
skills.des: When Cyclops casts this skill and hits enemies, all skill CD will be decreased by 0.5s.

skills.name: Stardust Shock
skills.des: Cyclops casts two shock waves of stardust towards, each dealing 245<font color='#27C0C7'>(+60% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to the enemy.

skills.name: Planets Attack
skills.des: Cyclops uses the power of stars to generate a starlit sphere spinning around him and increases 30% of his own Movement Speed within 2s. The sphere will attack nearby enemy heroes first, dealing 210<font color='#27C0C7'>(+50% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to them. (Damages dealt to the same target will decay.)

skills.name: Star Power Lockdown
skills.des: Cyclops creates a gigantic magic sphere filled with planetary power to chase his enemy, dealing 500<font color='#27C0C7'>(+220% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font>. The target will be immobilized for 1s-2s based on the distance the sphere travels.

equipments.name: Enchanted Talisman
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mana Spring:Regenerates 12% of Max Mana every 10s in total.

equipments.name: Genius Wand
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Magic:Dealing damage to enemy heroes will reduce 3~10 points of their Magic Defense (Scales with level). This effect lasts 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equipments.name: Concentrated Energy
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Recharge:Kill enemy hero to recover HP by 10%.

equipments.name: Divine Glaive
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Spellbreaker:When HP is higher than 70%, the unique bonus effect is increased by 30%

equipments.name: Blood Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Nirvana:Adds 1.5 HP for every 1 pt of magic power added.

hero.name: Johnson
hero.head: miya/hero/head/cbdf0965823646e396910fc9d5291563.png
hero.tale:
Johnson, with a hardy constitution as solid as a rock, ran through the dome stadium like a heavy truck, the cheers of girls bursting from everywhere. He led his team to lift the champion's trophy and achieved the highpoint of his life as a superstar quarterback with millions of fans. However, fortune is always fickle. A little girl suddenly rushed into the road while Johnson was driving his sports car. To avoid hitting the little girl he swerved and severely crashed his car. A massive hemorrhage was going to take his life quickly. 

At that moment, a miracle occurred. The wreckage of the sports car started to combine with Johnson's body by a mysterious force. Because of this, he not only survived the crash but also became a magical new human who could transform into a sports car.

skills.name: Electro-airbag
skills.des:
When Johnson's HP is lower than 30%, he generates a shield that absorbs 300<font color='#47BE34'>(+700% Total Physical DEF)</font> points of damage for 10s. 
This effect has a CD of 100s.

skills.name: Deadly Pincers
skills.des: Johnson throws a spanner in the designated direction that deals 200<font color='#47BE34'>(+150% Total Physical DEF)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in its path. Enemies in the area that the spanner lands will be stunned by 0.8s.

skills.name: Electromag Rays
skills.des:
Johnson raises his shield, continuously dealing 80<font color='#47BE34'>(+20% Total Physical DEF)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> forwards in a fan-shape range and slowing enemies. 
While holding the shield, Johnson can cast Basic Attack and skills.

skills.name: Rapid Touchdown
skills.des:
<font color='#404495'>(Passive)</font>: Permanently increases Physical Defense by 10%. 
Johnson jumps up and transforms into a car, accelerating over time. Only 1 teammate can get in the car when it's moving slowly, and then they will rush forward along with Johnson. The car will explode upon hitting an enemy hero, stunning the target and nearby enemies for 0.5s-1s, and dealing 300<font color='#27C0C7'>(+90% Total Magic Power)</font>-750<font color='#27C0C7'>(+225% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> according to the car's speed. After the explosion, the ground will be electrified, slowing enemies and dealing 80<font color='#27C0C7'>(+20% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to those who are in the area. When the car is going slowly, tap the skill <font color='#404495'>(Throttle)</font> again to move faster. Tap the skill <font color='#404495'>(Brake)</font> to stop immediately.

equipments.name: Antique Cuirass
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Success:Success

equipments.name: Warrior Boots
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Valor:Physical defense will go up 5 with each basic attack received, for an increase of up to 25 points. Lasts 3 seconds.

equipments.name: Cursed Helmet
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Success:Success

equipments.name: Blade Armor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Vengeance:Deals 25% of opponent's physical attack as physical damage to an attacker when a basic attack is received.

equipments.name: Oracle
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Bless:Raises shield absorption and HP regeneration effects by 30%.

equipments.name: Guardian Helmet
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Recovery:Regenerates 1.5% of hero's Max HP. Eliminating enemy heroes raises regeneration rate by 0.4%, while assists raises the rate by 0.2% (includes eliminations and Assists prior to purchase), up to 3.5%. This effect wears off after 5s of the hero taking damage.

hero.name: Moskov
hero.head: miya/hero/head/616d18a5053d81ed8cb7917690d01375.png
hero.tale:
Moskov, shooting to fame during the Dhamu Tournament, was already a battle master in his youth. He inherited the family's occult spear fighting skills and, as the next leader of the clan Wildsand, he was loved and respected by many. Watching the Wildsand clan growing stronger day by day, the khan of Thornwolf, who is the leader of the Hietala Grassland, couldn't sit back any longer. One day when the youngsters of Wildsand went out hunting, the Khan slaughtered the entire Wildsand clan. The whole land was scorched by blazing flames of war. Blood flowed like water, yet a slight warmth remained on the bodies of dead families and friends. Faced with this cruel vision, Moskov could not persuade himself to accept it. But even worse, the khan dispatched a formidable cavalry trying to hunt down Moskov's hunting party which were the only survivors from the massacre. In a panic, some fled while others wanted to surrender. Moskov, for the very first time, lifted his spear and aimed it at his own people. 

Suffering from this painful experience, Moskov became ruthless with the thought of revenge haunting him constantly. However, the khan was too strong to defeat. In order to obtain more power, Moskov chose to fall into the Abyss of Shadow and serve the Queen of Doom, becoming notorious as 'the Spear of Quiescence' ever since.

skills.name: Spear of Quiescence
skills.des: Moskov's Basic Attack can penetrate targets and deal 80% points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies behind him. If a Basic Attack hits a target successfully, the CD of "Abyss Walker" and "Spear of Misery" will be reduced by 1s.

skills.name: Abyss Walker
skills.des: Moskov uses the power of shadow to teleport to the designated position, increasing 20% of his ATK Speed within 3s. Meanwhile, his Basic Attack deals 20% more Damage to enemies behind the target.

skills.name: Spear of Misery
skills.des:
Moskov strikes at an enemy hero with full strength, dealing 140<font color='#D58E1F'>(+40% Total Physical ATK)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and knocking back the target. The target's position will be exposed for 5s. 
If the target collides with another enemy hero when knocked back, then both of them will take 210<font color='#D58E1F'>(+60% Total Physical ATK)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and be stunned for 1s. If the target hero knocks onto obstacles, they will be stunned for 2s.

skills.name: Spear of Destruction
skills.des: Moskov throws out the Spear of Destruction after charging shortly, dealing 480<font color='#D58E1F'>(+140% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies along a straight line. Each Spear hitting an enemy hero will increase 10 Physical Attack of Moskov. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 8s.

equipments.name: Demon Hunter Sword
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Devour:Basic attacks will deal 9% of the target's current HP as additional physical damage (up to 60 against creeps and minions).
Unique Passive-Devour:Each Basic Attack grants 4% Physical Lifesteal for 3s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equipments.name: Scarlet Phantom
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Frenzy:Crit hits increase the hero's ATK Speed by 30% and Crit Chance by 5%. Lasts 2s.

equipments.name: Berserker's Fury
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Doom:Crit hit will increase the hero's Physical Attack by 5% for 2s.

equipments.name: Malefic Roar
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Armor Buster:Basic Attack will ignore 20% of a Turret's Defense.

equipments.name: Rose Gold Meteor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Lifeline:Success

hero.name: Yi Sun-shin
hero.head: miya/hero/head/b4d3a57a307e79c2826a0b93afdd7c20.png
hero.tale:
Chungmugong Yi Sun-shin was a famous general in an Asian kingdom. He was extremely loyal and brave. At a time when the nation was in danger, Yi Sun-shin built a powerful navy and created the iron armored 'turtle ship'. This made an indelible contribution to the Korean Kingdom which became known for dominating the sea areas. 'Wherever iron turtle ship sails, the sea areas belong to me.' said Yi. 

Yi was excellent at the strategy of 'overtaking the majority with the minority'. Under his leadership, the Korean navy defeated over 330 enemy warships with only 12 ships, gaining a great triumph at the Battle of Myeongnyang. To this day, the legend of this Asian general still lives on in the hearts of people.

skills.name: Heavenly Vow
skills.des:
Yi Sun-shin chooses his longbow or glaive to attack according to his distance from his enemies. Using the glaive to attack will deal more damage and reduce the CD of <font color='#404495'>("One-wave Sweep")</font> by 1s. 
A naval fleet will be summoned at the allied Base to strengthen it. Yi Sun-shin can board the Turtle Ship beside the base periodically and get buffs.

skills.name: One-wave Sweep
skills.des:
With glaive in hand, Yi Sun-shin slashes forward, dealing 160<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies along the way and slowing them by 30% for 2s. 
When Yi Sun-shin is on his Turtle Ship, the ship will dash in the designated direction, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the first enemy it collides with and enemies nearby, stunning them for 1.5s.

skills.name: Blood Floods
skills.des:
Yi Sun-shin shoots a piercing arrow at full strength, dealing 160<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies as well as slowing them by 40%. Lasts 2s. 
The arrow's attack range and damage scale with charge time. The first enemy takes full damage, the next one takes 20% less (up to 60% less damage). When charging, his Movement Speed will be reduced slightly.

skills.name: Mountain Shocker
skills.des: Yi Sun-shin summons the naval fleet to launch 3 waves of rocket attacks. Each wave deals 165<font color='#D58E1F'>(+35% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and will also slow enemies slightly.

equipments.name: Blade of the Heptaseas
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Ambush:Next Basic Attack will deal extra Physical Damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack if no damage taken or dealt within 5s.

equipments.name: Blade of Despair
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

equipments.name: Malefic Roar
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Armor Buster:Basic Attack will ignore 20% of a Turret's Defense.

equipments.name: Rose Gold Meteor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Lifeline:Success

hero.name: Ruby
hero.head: miya/hero/head/5ae3e423af5e5e470e5a3a84d8f6b915.png
hero.tale:
It was another peaceful night in a remote village among the Dark Forest before it was interrupted by the vicious howling of the wolves from afar. In a small cabin, a little girl was kneeling on her bed, praying. Next to her stood disproportionately giant scythes. She was praying for the return of the legendary hunter - Roger. Only he could save the village from being vandalized by the wolves. 

Years earlier, Roger saved her family by accident when he was wandering in the Land of Dawn. His bravery took a huge toll on the wolves. At the request from the elderly in the village, Roger finally stayed to train the villagers. One day, he left the village without any notice and no trace to be found. 

What happens in the fairy tales can seldom be the same in reality. On a silent, moonless night, Pale Tusk, the wolf king, caught the village off guard and sneaked in with his pack. In the end, her grandfather and grandmother died trying to protect Ruby, who in turn made a narrow escape by hiding under the corpses of her grandparents. No one could imagine that from the moment she witnessed her grandparents' death, her character would completely change. Outraged, she got back on her feet, picked up the scythes, rushed into the wolves, and slaughtered almost all of them. Under her seemingly weak appearance now lies an unsettling, irritable soul. Pale Tusk was the only survivor among the wolves. Staring at the skyline, Ruby decided to make a happy ending for all the good people in every story. Pale Tusk was never defeated before but this time it came in the severest way. Ruby gradually regained consciousness after Pale Tusk left. Now, whenever the wolves howl, her eyes become once more filled with rage.

skills.name: Let's dance!
skills.des:
Ruby has 5% Physical Lifesteal Effect of her own and inherits  125% Physical Lifesteal Effect from Equipment.(Her Basic Attack enjoys no lifesteal effect.) 
After any skill is cast, Ruby can jump to another place，increasing 16<2|lv 1.6> points of Physical and Magic Defense for a short period of time. (Effect scales with levels. Stacks up to 3 times and lasts 4s.)

skills.name: Be good!
skills.des: Ruby quickly slashes her scythe forward, dealing 60<font color='#D58E1F'>(+60% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. At the same time, she casts a shockwave forward, dealing 90<font color='#D58E1F'>(+90% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies and slowing them by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Don't run, Wolf King!
skills.des: Ruby wields her giant scythe to attack twice. Every attack deals 60<font color='#D58E1F'>(+55% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>, stunning enemies for 0.5s and slowly pulling them to her. Deals extra 20% damage to enemies in the outer ring.

skills.name: I'm offended!
skills.des: Ruby uses the scythe to attack in a wide range, dealing 205<font color='#D58E1F'>(+180% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies, pulling them to her and stunning them for 0.5s.

equipments.name: Haas's Claws
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Insanity:When HP drops below 40%, the hero will receive extra 10% Physical Lifesteal.

equipments.name: Warrior Boots
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Valor:Physical defense will go up 5 with each basic attack received, for an increase of up to 25 points. Lasts 3 seconds.

equipments.name: Oracle
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Bless:Raises shield absorption and HP regeneration effects by 30%.

equipments.name: Dominance Ice
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Arctic Cold:Lowers movement speed 10% and lowers attack speed 30% for nearby enemy heroes.

equipments.name: Endless Battle
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Divine Justice:After using a skill, the next Basic Attack will deal extra 85% of Physical Attack as True Damage. This effect has a CD of 1.5s.
Unique Passive-Chase Fate:When Divine Justice's effect is triggered, it will increase the hero's movement speed 10%.

equipments.name: Immortality
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Immortal:Resurrect 2s upon death and get 15% HP and a shield that can absorb 300~1000 points of damage. (Scales with hero level) Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a CD of 180s.

hero.name: Alpha
hero.head: miya/hero/head/213812946942410d3a1ae67a20fdac27.png
hero.tale: Alpha is another creation of Laboratory 1718 after Saber left. The mad scientists got a new idea from a famous sci-fi movie. Using human bodies as biological material and space meteorites as metal skeletons, they created powerful twins. Alpha and Beta, also known as 'Flesh Weapon', can utilize a supernatural power that's ubiquitous but very mystery. However, the twins had always had a strong conscience and refused to become killing machines. Getting help from Saber, they escaped from the alt-world. However, on their way to escape, Beta's core was destroyed. All that Alpha could retrieve was Beta's half metallic arm. After coming to the Land of Dawn, with the help of master machinist Rooney, Beta now keeps Alpha company in the form of an aircraft.

skills.name: Beta, Advance!
skills.des: Alpha summons Beta to attack and mark a target. Beta will attack the target continuously after 2 marks, dealing 150<font color='#D58E1F'>(+180% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font> in total.

skills.name: Rotary Impact
skills.des:
Alpha launches a slash forwards, dealing 210<font color='#D58E1F'>(+90% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies along the way and slowing them by 40% for 2s. 
After the light wave is launched, Beta will follow its trace to strafe enemies, dealing 90<font color='#D58E1F'>(+90% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.

skills.name: Force Swing
skills.des:
After charging for a while, Alpha strikes forward in a fan-shaped area and deals 160<font color='#D58E1F'>(+170% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies and slow them. Each hit increases his Attack Speed by 5% and restores 150<font color='#27C0C7'>(+40% Total Magic Power)</font> HP. 
When charging phase ends, Beta will strafe enemies within attack range, dealing 40<font color='#D58E1F'>(+30% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.

skills.name: Spear of Alpha
skills.des:
Alpha wields the light spear powerfully, stunning enemies for 1.3s and pulling himself to them, dealing 245<font color='#D58E1F'>(+140% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> along the way. 
When the light spear hits enemies, it will guide Beta to strafe toward the target area, dealing 205<font color='#D58E1F'>(+80% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.
