hero.name: Sun
hero.head: miya/hero/head/f78e7de06b9cb791e7fec961a7ee5f27.png
hero.tale:
Sun, born from a rock, has been extraordinary since the very beginning. Long ago he was pinned down under a mountain by gods, where he was trapped and unable to move. He watched time changing and the world being changed by the time. Although his body was covered by the freezing snow, the yearning for freedom in his heart never melted away. 

Waiting for the right opportunity to escape, he chanted 'freedom' repeatedly and finally broke his imprisonment, laughing as he flew away. Now, Sun has finally arrived in the Land of Dawn where this stone-born monkey's soul can be held down no more and he will start his own legend again.

skills.name: Simian God
skills.des: Physical Defense of enemies will be reduced by 6% when they take damage from Sun or his Doppelgangers. Stacks up to 10 times.

skills.name: Endless Variety
skills.des: Sun hurls his Golden Staff towards a designated direction, dealing 250<font color='#D58E1F'>(+60% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies along its path. Heroes and creeps that touch the Staff will be slowed for 2s. At that point, Sun will create a Doppelganger to attack the enemies. Doppelgangers enjoy 35% of Sun's attributes and last for 5s.

skills.name: Instantaneous Move
skills.des: Sun and his Doppelgangers launch an instantaneous attack against a designated enemy, dealing 180<font color='#D58E1F'>(+60% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. Within 2.5s of casting this skill, Sun and his doppelgangers enjoy a 30% increase in Movement Speed.

skills.name: Clone Techniques
skills.des: Sun summons a Doppelganger that has 70% of his attributes. Doppelgangers take more damage, while each of their attacks recover Sun's HP by <font color='#D58E1F'>(+80% Total Physical ATK)</font> points. Doppelgangers last 12s.

equipments.name: Demon Hunter Sword
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Devour:Basic attacks will deal 9% of the target's current HP as additional physical damage (up to 60 against creeps and minions).
Unique Passive-Devour:Each Basic Attack grants 4% Physical Lifesteal for 3s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equipments.name: Corrosion Scythe
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Corrosion:Basic Attack has 50% probability of slowing the enemy unit by 30%. Long-ranged Basic Attack only slows enemies by 15%.
Unique Passive-Impulse:When each Basic Attack deals damage to enemies, increase Attack Speed by 8%. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 3s.

equipments.name: Queen's Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Demonize:Reduces damage taken by 50% when health is less than 40% and increases your Physical Lifesteal by 30%. Lasts 5 seconds. This effect has a 50 second cooldown.

equipments.name: Brute Force Breastplate
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Brute Force:Casting a skill or using Basic Attacks will increase Movement Speed by 3%, Physical & Magic Defense by 4. Lasts 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equipments.name: Blade of Despair
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

hero.name: Chou
hero.head: miya/hero/head/e2e78dad437acc954a0eb50955e164c6.png
hero.tale:
Chou was born in a secluded slum deep in the hearts of poverty, living the lowest quality of life. Despite the dreadful conditions, Chou kept his heart of kindness, as day in and day out he continued to look after the old and the young there with passion. During this time, there was great turmoil and unrest in the Land of the Dawn; mayhem spread throughout the land and eventually started to affect this small remote area. 

One day, Chou rescued a mystic monk under pursuit by his captors and took him back to his slum to care for him. In return, the monk imparted the ancient Asian Kung-Fu skill to Chou and told him that the world needed a real hero to stand up and end the chaos. Chou made a vow right then and there that he would start on his journey in the Land of Dawn to become a true hero without looking back. As Chou was leaving, the monk nodded and disappeared into the shadows.

skills.name: Only fast
skills.des: After every 8 yards Chou moves, his next Basic Attack will deal 200% of damage (can't be critic) and shortly slow enemies by 80%.

skills.name: Jeet Kune Do
skills.des:
Chou punches forward for 3 times continuously. Each punch deals 180<font color='#D58E1F'>(+70% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. The 3rd attack knocks nearby enemies into the air. 
The 3rd use of this skill resets the CD of <font color='#404495'>("Shunpo")</font>.

skills.name: Shunpo
skills.des: Chou dashes forward, becoming immune to Control Effects during the dash. After the dash, Chou increases his Physical Penetration by 15 points and obtains a Shield that can absorb 200<font color='#D58E1F'>(+150% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of damage for 2s.

skills.name: The Way of Dragon
skills.des:
Chou casts a roundhouse kick to knock back enemies and deals 400<font color='#D58E1F'>(+200% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. 
Use Again: Chou will chase up the enemies in the air, dealing at least 400<font color='#D58E1F'>(+200% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.

equipments.name: Endless Battle
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Divine Justice:After using a skill, the next Basic Attack will deal extra 85% of Physical Attack as True Damage. This effect has a CD of 1.5s.
Unique Passive-Chase Fate:When Divine Justice's effect is triggered, it will increase the hero's movement speed 10%.

equipments.name: Rapid Boots
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Side Effect:Dealing or taking damage slows hero's movement speed by 40 points. Lasts 5 seconds.

equipments.name: Athena's Shield
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Shield:Get a shield of 170~1150 points every 30s. Shield absorption amount grows as the match goes on.

equipments.name: Hunter Strike
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Retribution:Deals damage to an enemy hero or Creep for 5 times in a row and improves Movement Speed by 30% for 3s. This effect has a CD of 15s.

equipments.name: Brute Force Breastplate
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Brute Force:Casting a skill or using Basic Attacks will increase Movement Speed by 3%, Physical & Magic Defense by 4. Lasts 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equipments.name: Antique Cuirass
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Success:Success

hero.name: Kagura
hero.head: miya/hero/head/f4178a0c1de9b1934a9b32b89bbc85df.png
hero.tale: Onmyouji Master is a master of the yin yang arts, driven by the powerful spirits, yin and yang. The Kagura family is the oldest and most powerful of the Onmyouji, with the most powerful of all being the Ancestor Master. Kagura, as one in the Onmyouji family with the most potential, was given the Seimei umbrella, an heirloom of the yin yang arts passed down through generations. Legend has it that the umbrella was refined by the great Seimei himself using power from a hundred ghosts. It is believed that it now possesses life and wisdom of its own which can only be controlled by its rightful owner. After learning that her childhood playmate Hayabusa had departed for the Land of Dawn to undertake a dangerous mission, Kagura secretly took the Seimei umbrella and followed in Hayabusa's step, hoping to help him in battle.

skills.name: Yin Yang Gathering
skills.des: When Kagura takes Seimei Umbrella, she will gain a shield that absorbs up to 280<font color='#27C0C7'>(+50% Total Magic Power)</font> damage, stunning nearby enemies for 0.5s and slowing them by 60%. Lasts 2s. This effect only activates every 4.5s.

skills.name: Seimei Umbrella Open
skills.des: Kagura moves Seimei Umbrella to the designated area, dealing 330<font color='#27C0C7'>(+150% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies along the way and slowing them by 60%. Lasts 1s.

skills.name: Rasho Umbrella Flee
skills.des: With Seimei Umbrella, Kagura removes all Debuffs on her and moves in a designated direction, leaving the Umbrella behind.

skills.name: Yin Yang Overturn
skills.des: With Seimei Umbrella, Kagura deals 260<font color='#27C0C7'>(+120% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font>, knocking back nearby enemies and slowing them by 65% for 1s.

equipments.name: Enchanted Talisman
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mana Spring:Regenerates 12% of Max Mana every 10s in total.

equipments.name: Lightning Truncheon
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Resonate:Every 6s, next Magic Skill deals extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies that scales with hero's Max Mana.

equipments.name: Concentrated Energy
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Recharge:Kill enemy hero to recover HP by 10%.

equipments.name: Divine Glaive
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Spellbreaker:When HP is higher than 70%, the unique bonus effect is increased by 30%

equipments.name: Blood Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Nirvana:Adds 1.5 HP for every 1 pt of magic power added.

hero.name: Natalia
hero.head: miya/hero/head/8b5cb0e4fdb75579fb9226cc3c13d745.png
hero.tale:
Natalia was raised from a young age by the Church of Light and trained to become one of the Church's assassins. This young phenom rose to become the top assassin for the Church via her outstanding talents. Unfortunately, on one assassination mission she failed causing her companion to meet with unprecedented disaster. Although she was able to escape danger with Tigreal's help, this was undoubtedly a severe blow to Natalia's pride. 

To prove herself again, she exiled herself to the outskirts of the land, far from the Empire and the Church, to carry out more dangerous missions. Who is her target? Will she be able to win back all that she once possessed?

skills.name: Assassin Instinct
skills.des:
Natalia deals 15% additional damage when attacking from behind (basic attack against creeps always triggers this bonus).
In the bush, Natalia becomes Stealthed (she will be detected when close to the enemy) if she has not taken or dealt any damage in 2s. Dealing damage or leaving the bush for 5s will break the concealment. Stealth increases Natalia's Movement SPD by 15% and enables her next basic attack to teleport to and backstab the target, dealing 270<font color='#D58E1F'>(+80% Total Physical ATK)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and silencing the enemy for 0.6s. Attack Turrets in Stealthed state, Natalia will blink to the flank side of the Turret.

skills.name: Claw Dash
skills.des: Natalia dashes forward, dealing 210<font color='#D58E1F'>(+40% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies along the way. This skill can be cast again within a short period of time after hitting an enemy.

skills.name: Smoke Bomb
skills.des: Natalia casts a smoke bomb that lasts for 4s on the current spot. In the smoke, enemies will be slowed by 40%. Meanwhile, Natalia increases her Attack Speed by 25% and becomes immune to all Basic Attacks.

skills.name: The Hunt
skills.des:
Natalia triggers Assassin Instinct and enters Stealth, empowering her basic attack. Increases 20 Physical ATK for 3s.
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again)</font>: this skill can be used again in 5s.

equipments.name: Blade of the Heptaseas
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Ambush:Next Basic Attack will deal extra Physical Damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack if no damage taken or dealt within 5s.

equipments.name: Berserker's Fury
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Doom:Crit hit will increase the hero's Physical Attack by 5% for 2s.

equipments.name: Endless Battle
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Divine Justice:After using a skill, the next Basic Attack will deal extra 85% of Physical Attack as True Damage. This effect has a CD of 1.5s.
Unique Passive-Chase Fate:When Divine Justice's effect is triggered, it will increase the hero's movement speed 10%.

equipments.name: Rose Gold Meteor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Lifeline:Success

equipments.name: Blade of Despair
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

hero.name: Gord
hero.head: miya/hero/head/51ea1cd76b527341f841dbde77414579.png
hero.tale:
Gord has always been the living proof of excellence in the magic academy. He was born with the gift to manipulate the mystic powers which allowed him to master several sophisticated spells at an early age. But this is clearly a double-edged sword as Gord became increasingly arrogant over time. Once he stumbled across a forbidden book in the academy which recorded the method to forge the pure mystic existence out of human body using mystic powers.

The young wizard buried himself in the book and launched his study without respecting the opinions from the outside. It worked out successfully in the beginning, the pure mystic energy started to flow in Gord's veins, thus he was able to cast even more powerful spells. Unfortunately, Gord was not able to control this power and he became overwhelmed with mystic energy. Gord then tried to seek a solution from ancient magic sources. With the combination of the two different energies, Gord's body was almost devastated. Thanks to the help from Elward, the chief wizard, the turbulence in his body was finally able to be controlled. The incident took a huge toll on Gord, leaving his body half red and half blue. While he was saved, Gord can never again control the magic contained in pure mystic energy.

Elward encouraged Gord until he finally got back on his feet. Elward then invited Gord to continue his career as a wizard and invited him to teach at the academy. After careful consideration, Gord accepted the offer. He wished to find a student who will carry on his studies without making the same mistakes. From that day, Gord started a new life as the strictest professor in the magic academy.

skills.name: Mystic Favor
skills.des: Dealing 4 hits of basic attack or skill damage to the same target, within a short period of time, grants a bonus of 160<font color='#E5CB19'>(+70% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font> on the next attack.

skills.name: Mystic Projectile
skills.des: Gord throws a Mystic Projectile that jumps forward at a designated area. Upon hitting an enemy unit, the Projectile will deal 270<font color='#27C0C7'>(+80% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> in the area and stun enemies for 1s.

skills.name: Mystic Injunction
skills.des: Gord summons an energy field, dealing 80<font color='#27C0C7'>(+20% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> every 0.45s.

skills.name: Mystic Gush
skills.des:
Gord fires a sustained blast of energy in a designated direction, dealing 200<font color='#27C0C7'>(+50% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> every 0.3s to enemies and slowing them by 20%. Lasts 3s. 
The direction of the blast can be changed by using the Left Joystick during this time.

equipments.name: Enchanted Talisman
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mana Spring:Regenerates 12% of Max Mana every 10s in total.

equipments.name: Fleeting Time
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Timestream:After an elimination or an assist, the CD of the hero’s ultimate is immediately reduced by 30%.

equipments.name: Genius Wand
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Magic:Dealing damage to enemy heroes will reduce 3~10 points of their Magic Defense (Scales with level). This effect lasts 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equipments.name: Glowing Wand
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Scorch:Skill Damage will burn targets for 3s, dealing 1%/1.75%/2.5% of the target's Max HP as Magic Damage per second. (10 damage minimum).

equipments.name: Blood Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Nirvana:Adds 1.5 HP for every 1 pt of magic power added.

hero.name: Freya
hero.head: miya/hero/head/a657bcc8aad2ad441472f41029759ae9.png
hero.tale:
Valkyries were distinguished and revered fighters among the warlike Northern Vale folks. The bravest and strongest female warriors in each tribe would be chosen to join their rank and take up the responsibility of guiding the spirits of fallen heroes into Valhalla and keeping the peace in Northern Vale. Becoming a Valkyrie would bring glory to everyone in the tribe, it was the greatest achievement one could ever dream for. But such a glory came with a price, and Valkyries had to make huge sacrifices for their privilege. “They shall never marry or bear children, they shall dedicate their entire live to the Northern Vale.”

At first, such glory and burden did not belong to Freya. As far as Freya could remember, her elder sister Skuld was their tribe’s best hope. She was clever, decisive, brave and resilient. She could already defeat all the other warriors in their tribe when she was only sixteen years old. The high priest of the Martyr Shrine foresaw the future in a prophecy. “A female warrior, daughter of the Northern Vale, will one day lead this land to a new path.” Everyone believed that the kid in the prophecy was Skuld, so she kept training day and night, hoping that one day she could take up the mantle and bring a glorious future to her tribe and the Northern Vale.

Unlike her sister Skuld, young Freya lived a carefree life. She was naughty, vigorous and curious. She admired her sister Skuld, believing that she could live happily ever after so long as her brilliant and lovingly sweet sister was with her. But her sister Skuld disagreed. She would always encourage Freya, saying that Freya would one day become the person who could lead their tribe and even all the Northern Vale folks.

When Freya was twelve, Skuld passed the high priest’s trial, became an exalted Valkyrie of the Martyr Shrine, and left her homeland. Two years later, Freya sneaked out of the tribe by herself and headed to Martyr Shrine, the place where all Northern Vale folks were forbidden to visit. She missed her sister so much that she was dying to see Skuld.

Her destiny was changed entirely that day. Outside of the Martyr Shrine, Freya was peeking at the Valkyries who were holding a transcendence ritual for the spirits of the dead. But inside this empty hall, a strange light caught Freya’s attention. Freya approached, and realized that it was a strange object floating above the altar. Its radiance encircled itself, like a giant light orb. It felt like there was a wonderful dreamland hidden in its light, calling Freya to come. Propelled by this mysterious force, Freya was unknowingly drawn to it, and reached out to touch the light orb floating above the altar.

Suddenly, an immense amount of energy raged inside the orb, then broke free from the seal of the altar, rising straight toward the sky. What Freya didn’t know was that this orb, Heart of Aurora, was actually an ancient relic kept and worshiped by the Northern Vale for the past hundreds of years. But it also had another secret identity: it was the legendary Apocalypse Shard.

After Freya accidentally touched it, the immense energy once contained within the Heart of Aurora got out of control and started to grow ever stronger. Should it exploded and spread, the entire Northern Vale would be swept away. This anomaly startled the priests and Valkyries outside. Facing this dire situation, the high priest told everyone that they had to jump into the energy field to be able to stop the energy from growing. Just as Freya was shocked and frozen by this terrible scene, a familiar and gentle figure appeared and hugged her from behind. Skuld emerged from the Valkyries, and gave her own sword and shield to Freya. Skuld smiled to her, then dived into the energy field.

The lights became blinding, then everything stopped, and peace was restored in the hall of Valhalla. But after this accident, Skuld and the Heart of Aurora gone rogue both went missing, never to be found again. Freya was in deep sorrow, she blamed herself for this tragedy. The old high priest approached and caressed her forehead. He told Freya that Skuld had always had high hopes for her sister, she believed that Freya was the chosen one, she believed that Freya could lead Northern Vale to a different path.

Devastated by the sense of guilt, Freya took up her sister's sword and shield along with her faith on her, and walked into the endless dark night. After years of training and extraordinary efforts, Freya finally became a Valkyrie at the age of twenty. She returned to the Martyr Shrine, took up her sister’s mantle, and kept watch for Northern Vale.

Times flew by as Freya stood guard in coldness and snow as a Valkyrie. She had been to everywhere in Northern Vale over the years, reconciling conflicts and resolving difficulties for people. She gave everything she had to Northern Vale, like a caring elder sister. 

As Captain Bane and his Black Shark Pirates rose, the world of Northern Vale shifted. The merciless Captain Bane and his mortal enemy Franco fought each other fiercely along the coast shore, and the newfound traces of the “Heart of Aurora” drew lots of attentions. The news came: the endless conflict between Bane and Franco, the “Heart of Aurora” that sank into the bottom of ocean, the lurking darkness. She remembered the tragedy that happened years ago and deeply missed her sister. Everything was calling Freya, leading her toward the coast shore.

There, she would find all the answers she sought, and she would protect her homeland at all cost as a Valkyrie of Northern Vale.

skills.name: Power of Einherjar
skills.des:
After casting a skill, Freya greatly increases her ATK Speed for the next 2 basic attacks. This effect has 6 stacks at most.
Freya gains a stack of <font color='#404495'>(Sacred Orb)</font> for every 2 attacks. By sacrificing different amounts of <font color='#404495'>(Sacred Orb)</font>, Freya can enhance her skills to different degrees.

skills.name: Leap of Faith
skills.des:
Freya jumps to a designated area, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>(+75% Extra Physical ATK)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in the area and pulling them to the center.
Sacred Orb Enhances: Sacrifices 1/2/3 stacks of <font color='#404495'>(Sacred Orb)</font>, increasing the damage to 120%/160%/200%, extending the area of effect and stunning the targets for 0.4/0.8/1.2s.

skills.name: Spirit Combo
skills.des:
Freya dashes forward and gains a shield that can absorb 160<font color='#D58E1F'>(+70% Extra Physical ATK)</font> damage, while dealing 160<font color='#D58E1F'>(+90% Total Physical ATK)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the enemies and slowing them by 30% for 0.5s.
Sacred Orb Enhances: the skill can be recast in 4s at the cost of 1 <font color='#404495'>(Sacred Orb)</font> up to 4 times.
Freya will swing the hammer on the <font color='#404495'>(4th cast)</font>, increasing the damage to 240<font color='#D58E1F'>(+135% Total Physical ATK)</font> and knocking the enemies airborne for 0.5s.

skills.name: Valkyrie Descent
skills.des:
Freya gains 3 stack(s) of <font color='#404495'>(Sacred Orb)</font> and enters <font color='#404495'>(Valkyrie State)</font>:
Gains a shield that can absorb 600<font color='#D58E1F'>(+180% Total Physical ATK)</font> damage and increase 30 Physical Attack. Her basic attack also becomes ranged and can deal <font color='#404495'>(Splash Damage)</font>. <font color='#404495'>(Valkyrie State)</font> lasts 10s.

skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

equipments.name: Immortality
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Immortal:Resurrect 2s upon death and get 15% HP and a shield that can absorb 300~1000 points of damage. (Scales with hero level) Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a CD of 180s.

skill_tips: Unique Passive-Lifeline:Success

hero.name: Hayabusa
hero.head: miya/hero/head/8a7526428d3183d36e53b893bd72c5f9.png
hero.tale: Many years ago, the god of the very first ninjas created the Order of the Scarlet Shadow, formed of countless outstanding disciples. Over time, beliefs within the order diverged, and the Scarlet Shadow split into two factions -- the Scarlet Sect and the Shadow Sect. Conflict between the two sects gradually intensified, even to the point of drawing swords on one another. In order to avoid bloodshed, the two sects decided that every ten tears they would select the best Scarlet ninja and the best Shadow ninja to duel. The winner would inherit the title "Scarlet Shadow Grandmaster", under whom the two sects would study according to the ninja code left behind by their god. Ten years ago, a Shadow emerged possessing the kind of exceptional ability one sees only once in a hundred years. Even the Scarlet sect recognized his talent, but as they anticipated the day this Shadow would inherit the Scarlet Shadow title to unite the two sects and resurrect the glory of the Order of the Scarlet Shadow, heinous events transpired that would change the ninja world forever. While undertaking a mission, the Shadow brutally killed the Scarlet Sect's leader and returned to assert his supreme dominance over the two sects. Betraying one's companions is the most unforgivable sin among ninjas, and the infuriated ninjas of the two sects decided to take action. They sent the foremost elite ninjas from the two sects to encircle the Shadow. The ensuing battle was the most chaotic in the Scarlet Shadow's history. The two groups of elite ninjas were all slain, and the injured Shadow fled the Scarlet Shadow with his life. This battle greatly weakened the sects, bringing shame to them both, and cracks between the factions emerged once again. In the end, the two sects agreed that whoever found and killed the disgraced Shadow would become the Scarlet Shadow Grandmaster. The patriarch of the Shadow Sect selected the young Hayabusa to undergo training to this end, teaching him the secret methods of shadow manipulation without reservation, and as fate predicted, ten years later he became the strongest ninja the Shadow Sect had ever seen, and their new rightful Shadow. However, Hayabusa knew in his heart that his only purpose was to kill the former Shadow. When the former shadow re-emerged in the Land of Dawn, Hayabusa knew that the day of reckoning was not far off...

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Shadow Heal
skills.des: Hayabusa’s ninjutsu damage inflicts 1 Shadow Stack. Every stack increases Hayabusa’s ninjutsu damage by 5%.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Phantom Shuriken
skills.des:
Hayabusa throws three shurikens forward that will travel back to him after flying a certain distance. Each shuriken deals 170<font color='#D58E1F'>(+70% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies, slows them and recover Hayabusa 10 points of energy. Damage and regenerative effects of this skill decay over times. 
Every level of this skill will grant Hayabusa extra 3% Spell Vamp.

skills.name: Ninjutsu: Quad Shadow
skills.des:
Hayabusa moves in a designated direction and releases a phantom behind him. If he hits an enemy in the path, he will stop immediately and release 3 phantoms that travel in different directions. When phantoms hit enemy heroes, they will seep into them, deal 130<font color='#D58E1F'>(+30% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and slow them by 40%. Lasts 2s.
Use again: Hayabusa can move to a phantom’s location. If that phantom happens to be in an enemy hero, Hayabusa will deal extra 130<font color='#D58E1F'>(+30% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to them. Every time Hayabusa moves using Quad Shadow, the CD for Shuriken will be reduced by 1s.

skills.name: Ougi: Shadow Kill
skills.des: Hayabusa turns into a shadow and dashes around the battlefield, dealing 5 times of Single-target attack to enemies in an area. Each attack deals 160<font color='#D58E1F'>(+90% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.

skill_tips: Unique Passive-Retribution:Deals damage to an enemy hero or Creep for 5 times in a row and improves Movement Speed by 30% for 3s. This effect has a CD of 15s.

equipments.name: Immortality

skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

hero.name: Lolita
hero.head: miya/hero/head/3730dba6b7d09fafe0315c58df380c05.png
hero.tale:
Lolita was born in a distant elven village, living a happy, uneventful life. That is, until war brought an end to those peaceful, safe days. Her whole village was destroyed in the war and her family torn apart. Just as her own life was in grave peril, Dr. Rooney, the master machinist of the City of Scholars, found her when he was passing through and took her back to Eruditio. 

To show her gratitude to the city, Lolita joined the City Guard and swore an oath to the death to defend its honor. Bruno very much admired and understood this young elf maiden's spirit, and so he put in a request with the city scholars for their most advanced tech crystal-- the Noumenon Energy Core-- and bestowed it to Lolita. 

This powerful energy core endows Lolita's tiny frame with the ability to discharge massive Bursts of force, even allowing her to control a giant mechanical hammer with ease.

skills.name: Noumenon Energy Core
skills.des: If Lolita takes no damage in 5s, Noumenon Energy Core will provide a shield that can take 300<2|lv 40> points of damage, lasting 20s. Lolita's nearby allies can get shields while approaching her.

skills.name: Charge
skills.des: Lolita dashes in the designated direction. In next 4s, her next Basic Attack will take her to the enemy target, dealing <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> equal to 200<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Total Physical ATK)</font> plus 7.5% of target's Max HP. Meanwhile, the target will be stunned for 0.8s. Deals 200<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Total Physical ATK)</font> plus 50% of target's Max HP to Minions.

skills.name: Guardian's Bulwark
skills.des:
Lolita raises her shield to block all incoming Ranged Basic Attacks and <font color='#404495'>(Projectiles)</font>.
Use again: Lolita launches Energy Blast, dealing 300<font color='#D58E1F'>(+50% Total Physical ATK)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. (Every time the shield blocks attack increases 35% damage. Capped at 210%).

skills.name: Noumenon Blast
skills.des: Lolita gains a shield from her Passive. Then after charging for 2s, she deals 350<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Total Physical ATK)</font> to 700<font color='#D58E1F'>(+200% Total Physical ATK)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> in a fan-shaped area in front of her. When casting at Max charge, Lolita will also stun her enemies for 2s (Tap again to cast immediately). When charging, Lolita slows enemies in the fan-shaped area by 75%.

equipments.name: Shadow Mask
skill_tips: Active Skill-Conceal: Conceals you and your teammates nearby and increases Movement SPD by 15% for 5s. Dealing or taking damage will end the state. Cooldown: 80s. This effect prevents hero from benefiting from Conceal and Encourage again in 80s.

Unique Passive-Devotion:Obtain 2 EXP and Gold every 4s. In the first 12 minutes of the match, this equipment makes you gain nothing from Minions or Creeps if there are teammates without Roaming Equipment, or those with but have higher EXP or Gold than yours around you. They will share the whole EXP or Gold.

Unique Passive-Thriving:Gains extra 35% Gold and EXP with Assists. When your Gold ranks the 5th in your team, increase Gold you gain to 20 per 4s. When your EXP ranks the 5th in your team, increase EXP you gain to 35 per 4s.

equipments.name: Antique Cuirass
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Success:Success

equipments.name: Oracle
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Bless:Raises shield absorption and HP regeneration effects by 30%.

equipments.name: Athena's Shield
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Shield:Get a shield of 170~1150 points every 30s. Shield absorption amount grows as the match goes on.

equipments.name: Guardian Helmet
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Recovery:Regenerates 1.5% of hero's Max HP. Eliminating enemy heroes raises regeneration rate by 0.4%, while assists raises the rate by 0.2% (includes eliminations and Assists prior to purchase), up to 3.5%. This effect wears off after 5s of the hero taking damage.

hero.name: Minotaur
hero.head: miya/hero/head/17fcb34ed27dba118bc53a1b63af1972.png
hero.tale: The young Minotaur was the most talented and powerful one in the kingdom, who admired and worshiped by others, up until he was defeated by a youth from a far-off land. As a prodigy, his confidence has never been so knocked up and finally he blamed it on his own weakness. To become stronger and powerful, he chose to enter the Minos Maze and started his self-training with the help of Twilight Orb's power, never thought how hard it would become.

skills.name: Rage Mode
skills.des: Hitting enemies with Skills or Basic Attacks will recover Rage of Minotaur. Once his Rage reaches its maximum, he will enter a <font color='#404495'>(Rage State)</font> and gain extra Physical Attack, Physical and Magic Defense (Scales with levels). And his skills will also have extra effects. After his Rage state fades, he can't recover Rage or use <font color='#404495'>("Minoan Fury")</font> for a brief period.

skills.name: Despair Stomp
skills.des:
Minotaur jumps towards a designated location. Upon landing, he will deal 280<font color='#D58E1F'>(+60% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to all surrounding enemies and slow them by 65%. Lasts 2s. Minotaur will recover Rage when he hits enemies with this skill. 
<font color='#404495'>(Rage State)</font>: The Attack Range becomes much larger, dealing extra <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> equal to 1.5% of target's Max HP.

skills.name: Motivation Roar
skills.des:
Minotaur motivates himself and surrounding allies, regenerating 260 HP of them and enjoying an extra healing effect based on the damage he has taken. Within the next 2s, Minotaur recovers Rage when hit by Basic Attacks. 
<font color='#404495'>(Rage State)</font>: Minotaur gains <font color='#404495'>(Rage Regen)</font> Effect within 2s, causing him to recover HP when hit by Basic Attacks.

skills.name: Minoan Fury
skills.des:
Minotaur enters a Rage-save state where he continuously recovers Rage. The longer this skill is charged, the more Rage he recovers. 
<font color='#404495'>(Rage State)</font>: Minotaur smashes the ground 3 times, sending shockwaves that deal 180<font color='#D58E1F'>(+85% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to surrounding enemies, knocking them airborne and slowing them by 70%. The final shockwave deals 200<font color='#E5CB19'>(+85% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font>.

Unique Passive-Devotion:Obtain 2 EXP and Gold every 4s. In the first 12 minutes of the match, this equipment makes you gain nothing from Minions or Creeps if there are teammates without Roaming Equipment, or those with but have higher EXP or Gold than yours around you. They will share the whole EXP or Gold.

Unique Passive-Thriving:Gains extra 35% Gold and EXP with Assists. When your Gold ranks the 5th in your team, increase Gold you gain to 20 per 4s. When your EXP ranks the 5th in your team, increase EXP you gain to 35 per 4s.

skill_tips: Unique Passive-Success:Success

skill_tips: Unique Passive-Bless:Raises shield absorption and HP regeneration effects by 30%.

hero.name: Layla
hero.head: miya/hero/head/49235855149137629b40866c8f4d4a35.png
hero.tale:
Layla was born to a family of guns. Lively and outgoing as a child, she was always optimistic and full of a sense of justice and adventure. She dreamed of becoming an emissary of the Land of Dawn who would fight to protect its peace. Her father was the most famous firearms master in the Land of Dawn's City of Scholars, but as a child Layla wasn't interested in the inventions of her family. As she grew up, she desired to become a famous mage and study at the Magic Academy, where she could study the magic of her dreams. But alas, reality was cruel. Her dreams were heartlessly rejected by her father, who himself dreamed of a day when the City of Scholars would surpass the Magic Academy in fame and power. He spent his time researching the ultimate firearm technology that would be more powerful than anything possessed by the Magic Academy. In his research he consulted many ancient records before discovering that deep within the Southern Abyss lied a magic stone that, if harnessed, could be used to produce firearms of incredible power. His goal of surpassing the Magic Academy was now within reach.

Paying no mind to the concerns of his daughter and wife, he embarked on a dangerous expedition into the abyss. The road was far, but her father finally found the magic stone he was looking for on the edge of the abyss. Seeing that he would soon succeed in creating his ultimate weapon, Layla's father brimmed with excitement. After returning home he worked dawn to dusk on his final creation, not stopping even to eat or drink. But his joy did not last long. Excessive contact with the magic stone caused him to lose his mind, and his temper worsened as his actions became strange and erratic.

Strange creatures silently entered the City of Scholars in search of their lost magic stone. These stones belonged to the Lord of the Abyss, who did not allow anything to be taken from his realm. The creatures could sense the stone's location, and they ambushed Layla's house within the City of Scholars. Her mother was killed, and her father completely lost all reason. The young Layla was terrified as it seemed that she, too, would fall victim to the claws of these strange beings. At the last second her father appeared and drew off the attackers, leaving Layla with no hope except for her father's newly-created Malefic Cannon. Layla pulled hard on the trigger, and the gun sprung to action just as the monsters leapt to attack her. The energies from the gun were so strong that their blast waves hit her father too. No longer of a reasoning mind, he looked silently at Layla before holding onto his injured arm and jumping out of the window. It was then that Layla's father left the City of Scholars. Layla decided she would learn the technology behind the Malefic Cannon and represent the City of Scholars throughout the land as she searched for her father. She trained constantly, and at the age of 16 embarked on her path to become a hero.

skills.name: Malefic Gun
skills.des: Layla's damage of basic attacks and skills scales with distance between her and enemies, from 100% up to 130%.

skills.name: Malefic Bomb
skills.des: Layla fires a Malefic Energy Bomb forward, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>(+80% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the first enemy hit. Malefic Energy Bomb enjoys Crit Effect.

skills.name: Void Projectile
skills.des: Layla fires an energy ball that explodes, dealing 170<font color='#D58E1F'>(+65% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the target and nearby enemies, slowing them by 40% for 2s. The skill range scales with levels.

skills.name: Destruction Rush
skills.des: Layla fires an energy cannon, dealing 500<font color='#D58E1F'>(+150% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in front of her. Building this skill also increases her basic attack range by 0.4 points.

equipments.name: Demon Hunter Sword
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Devour:Basic attacks will deal 9% of the target's current HP as additional physical damage (up to 60 against creeps and minions).
Unique Passive-Devour:Each Basic Attack grants 4% Physical Lifesteal for 3s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equipments.name: Windtalker
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Typhoon:Every 5s, Basic Attack hits 3 enemy units and deals 150 points of [C3Magic Damage]. This effect's CD drops as your Crit Chance rises, while damage rises as Attack Speed rises. (Deals 100% more Damage to Minions.)
Unique Passive-Activate:Each time Typhoon is cast, one's movement speed will be increased 5% for a short time.

equipments.name: Berserker's Fury
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Doom:Crit hit will increase the hero's Physical Attack by 5% for 2s.

equipments.name: Malefic Roar
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Armor Buster:Basic Attack will ignore 20% of a Turret's Defense.

equipments.name: Rose Gold Meteor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Lifeline:Success

hero.name: Fanny
hero.head: miya/hero/head/b00561a7cefe8f424bce4e10de9d9dda.png
hero.tale: Despite being just a human, Fanny never gave up on her dream of flying. She fashioned a kind of steel grappling hook for herself in the hopes of using it to grab onto cliff faces and soar between mountain peaks. After countless training sessions in live environments, Fanny finally mastered this technique. Folks who have seen her soaring through the air refer to her as the Blade of Freedom.

skills.name: Air Superiority
skills.des: According to her flying speed , Fanny's damage while flying is increased by 15% to 30% and leaves a <font color='#404495'>(Prey Mark)</font> on the target (Stack up to 2 times). Each stack regens energy for 10 points when she deals damage to enemies with <font color='#404495'>(Prey Mark)</font>. (Energy regen effect decays if she deals damage to multiple enemy heroes in a short time.)

skills.name: Tornado Strike
skills.des: Fanny whirls her blade, dealing 260<font color='#D58E1F'>(+90% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Steel Cable
skills.des:
Fanny throws out a cable that draws her to the first obstacle that it touches. Each successive use of this skill within 2s decreases its energy cost by 1 and changes her flying direction. 
If energy is sufficient and she hits an enemy while flying, <font color='#404495'>(Tornado Strike)</font> will be triggered.

skills.name: Cut Throat
skills.des: Fanny initiates a quick attack on an enemy, dealing 500<font color='#D58E1F'>(+240% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. Each stack of <font color='#404495'>(Prey Mark)</font> of enemies will increase her damage by 20%.

equipments.name: Warrior Boots
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Valor:Physical defense will go up 5 with each basic attack received, for an increase of up to 25 points. Lasts 3 seconds.

equipments.name: Rose Gold Meteor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Lifeline:Success

equipments.name: Blade of Despair
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

equipments.name: Brute Force Breastplate
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Brute Force:Casting a skill or using Basic Attacks will increase Movement Speed by 3%, Physical & Magic Defense by 4. Lasts 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equipments.name: Immortality
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Immortal:Resurrect 2s upon death and get 15% HP and a shield that can absorb 300~1000 points of damage. (Scales with hero level) Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a CD of 180s.

hero.name: Zilong
hero.head: miya/hero/head/c9bd8d2c635dd8f4f769649e342d0ccd.png
hero.tale: There was a tale of a Great Dragon that had nine sons. They were unique to each other and responsible for their own duties. Seldom did the Great Dragon gather with his sons, however, as the adopted son, Zilong assisted the Great Dragon instead of the royal sons. In the eyes of the Great Dragon, Zilong was way better in his personalities and abilities, which made Zilong deeply trusted by him. Long ago, Zilong swore an oath to roam from world to world, assisting wise rulers by the Great Dragon's decree. Whenever a new king was in need of his strength, Zilong traverses space and time to remove all obstacles and enemies before the king, using spear fighting techniques endowed upon him by the Great Dragon. Now the Land of Dawn is in great danger and Zilong has come to its aid. With his sense of justice and bravery, Zilong defeated many enemies and his name spread among the land. Regardless of how strong the enemy was, Zilong's spear would not forgive any evil who tried to destroy this continent.

skills.name: Dragon Flurry
skills.des: Every 6s, Zilong's next Basic Attack will land a combo on the target in front of him for multiple times, dealing a total of 1.8x Basic Attack damage. Hitting enemies with a Basic Attack will reduce the CD of Passive by 0.5s.

skills.name: Spear Flip
skills.des: Zilong lifts an enemy over his back, dealing 300<font color='#D58E1F'>(+140% Extra Physical ATK)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and reducing the target's Physical Defense by 10 for 2s.

skills.name: Spear Strike
skills.des: Zilong dashes toward the target, dealing 260<font color='#D58E1F'>(+30% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. Then he performs a quick Basic Attack immediately.

skills.name: Supreme Warrior
skills.des: Zilong increases Movement Speed by 30% and Attack Speed by 45%, becoming immune to Slowing Effect for 6s. Removes Debuffs upon casting.

equipments.name: Haas's Claws
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Insanity:When HP drops below 40%, the hero will receive extra 10% Physical Lifesteal.

equipments.name: Corrosion Scythe
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Corrosion:Basic Attack has 50% probability of slowing the enemy unit by 30%. Long-ranged Basic Attack only slows enemies by 15%.
Unique Passive-Impulse:When each Basic Attack deals damage to enemies, increase Attack Speed by 8%. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 3s.

equipments.name: Queen's Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Demonize:Reduces damage taken by 50% when health is less than 40% and increases your Physical Lifesteal by 30%. Lasts 5 seconds. This effect has a 50 second cooldown.

equipments.name: Brute Force Breastplate
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Brute Force:Casting a skill or using Basic Attacks will increase Movement Speed by 3%, Physical & Magic Defense by 4. Lasts 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equipments.name: Blade of Despair
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

hero.name: Eudora
hero.head: miya/hero/head/4b2e540fa9178fde9fe5c5c6288428ad.png
hero.tale:
Ever since she was an apprentice wizard, Eudora's special talent for controlling lightning always shocked (no pun intended) her many teachers. After a brief period of study, her teachers discovered she had already mastered all they had to teach her. 

Yearning to continue her progress, Eudora set foot on the road to the Land of Dawn, believing that her lightning magic could reach new heights in that turbulent land.

skills.name: Superconductor
skills.des: Eudora's skills inflict the target with the <font color='#404495'>(Superconductor)</font> effect that makes them take more Magic Damage from her.

skills.name: Forked Lightning
skills.des: Eudora casts forked lightning to deal 450<font color='#27C0C7'>(+230% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area in front of her, inflicting the <font color='#404495'>(Superconductor)</font> effect that reduces Magic Defense by 15 points.

skills.name: Electric Arrow
skills.des: Eudora strikes an enemy with a bolt of lightning, dealing 350<font color='#27C0C7'>(+105% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> and stunning the target for 0.75s. Enemies under the <font color='#404495'>(Superconductor)</font> state are stunned for 0.75s more.

skills.name: Thunderstruck
skills.des: Eudora summons a great storm of lightning, dealing 700<font color='#27C0C7'>(+270% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to the main target and 400<font color='#27C0C7'>(+180% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to other enemies around the target. Enemies under the <font color='#404495'>(Superconductor)</font> state take 15% more damage.

equipments.name: Lightning Truncheon
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Resonate:Every 6s, next Magic Skill deals extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies that scales with hero's Max Mana.

equipments.name: Demon Shoes
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mysticism:Eliminations of enemy heroes and assists regenerates hero’s mana by 10%, while eliminating minions regenerates 4% of the hero’s mana.

equipments.name: Fleeting Time
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Timestream:After an elimination or an assist, the CD of the hero’s ultimate is immediately reduced by 30%.

equipments.name: Holy Crystal
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mystery:Increases Magic Attack by 21%~35% (Scales with level).

equipments.name: Divine Glaive
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Spellbreaker:When HP is higher than 70%, the unique bonus effect is increased by 30%

equipments.name: Blood Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Nirvana:Adds 1.5 HP for every 1 pt of magic power added.

hero.name: Rafaela
hero.head: miya/hero/head/9d46c30600d5abffe536f238e840ed5b.png
hero.tale: Rafaela is an angel capable of miraculously healing anything. It is said that when she appears, all pain suddenly vanishes, all wounds instantly heal, and all evil disperses like rain clouds when the sun comes out. Now Rafaela has descended upon the Land of Dawn in the hopes of using her miraculous powers to restore peace to the land.

skills.name: Deity Penalization
skills.des: Rafaela penalizes the target who has killed her (the target should be within a certain range). She charges for 2s and then sends the penalization power to the target, dealing <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font> equal to 20% of the target's Max HP. It can be blocked by other enemy heroes. This skill works only on enemy heroes.

skills.name: Light of Retribution
skills.des: Rafaela uses the power of Holy Light to deal 225<font color='#27C0C7'>(+120% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to  three nearest enemies, revealing them for a short period of time and slowing them by 40% for 1.5s. If this skill hits the same target within 5s, then the damage of this skill will increase by 20%. Stacks up to 3 times.

skills.name: Holy Healing
skills.des: Rafaela summons Holy Light to regenerate 370<font color='#27C0C7'>(+50% Total Magic Power)</font> HP for herself and the most-injured nearby ally. Regenerates 90<font color='#27C0C7'>(+25% Total Magic Power)</font> HP for other nearby allied heroes. Increases their Movement Speed by 50% within the following 1s.

skills.name: Holy Baptism
skills.des: Rafaela uses the power of Holy Light to punish enemies in front of her, dealing 460<font color='#27C0C7'>(+120% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> and stunning them for 1.5s, at the same time, slowing them by 40%.

equipments.name: Awe Mask
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Deter:Basic Attack will mark an enemy hero and slow the hero down by 90% for 1.2s. (Each mark will refresh the duration of it; A target cannot be marked twice in 0.6s). During the mark time, this hero will be stunned for 1.5s when attacked 5 times by you or your teammates. Cools down every 40s.

Unique Passive-Devotion:Obtain 2 EXP and Gold every 4s. In the first 12 minutes of the match, this equipment makes you gain nothing from Minions or Creeps if there are teammates without Roaming Equipment, or those with but have higher EXP or Gold than yours around you. They will share the whole EXP or Gold.

Unique Passive-Thriving:Gains extra 35% Gold and EXP with Assists. When your Gold ranks the 5th in your team, increase Gold you gain to 20 per 4s. When your EXP ranks the 5th in your team, increase EXP you gain to 35 per 4s.

equipments.name: Enchanted Talisman
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mana Spring:Regenerates 12% of Max Mana every 10s in total.

equipments.name: Glowing Wand
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Scorch:Skill Damage will burn targets for 3s, dealing 1%/1.75%/2.5% of the target's Max HP as Magic Damage per second. (10 damage minimum).

equipments.name: Ice Queen Wand
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Ice Bound:Skills that deal damage to an enemy hero will slow them by 15%. This effect lasts 3s. Stacks up to 2 times.

equipments.name: Blood Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Nirvana:Adds 1.5 HP for every 1 pt of magic power added.

hero.name: Clint
hero.head: miya/hero/head/9d5a8aab9b4aa052022a6c874afe48bf.png
hero.tale:
No one knows where he comes from or why he fights, but everyone born in the Wastelands knows that Clint is the only semblance of justice in these parts. Even the boldest of thieves wouldn't dare to challenge Clint and his six shooters. With his lightning reflexes and unparalleled accuracy, he buries a flurry of bullets into his enemies' foreheads before they have time to blink. 

He only draws his guns for what he believes are just causes, but when he does, there's hardly a villain alive who can escape his righteous barrels.

skills.name: Quick Draw
skills.des: Each time Clint casts a skill, his next Basic Attack penetrates a line of targets, dealing <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> that can inherit 120% of ATK Effect. This skill can be critical.

skills.name: Blind Smoke
skills.des: Clint projects a smoke bomb, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>(+50% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in the area. The hit rate of enemies' Basic Attacks in the smoke area is decreased by 40% and their Movement Speed is decreased by 40%.

skills.name: Heel Rope
skills.des: Clint shoots a trap net forwards, dealing 140<font color='#D58E1F'>(+30% Total Physical ATK)</font><font color='#27C0C7'>(+30% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the first enemy hit and slowing them by 40% for 2s. He will also jump back a little at the same time.

skills.name: Howitzer
skills.des:
Clint launches a grenade in a designated direction. The grenade explodes and deals 250<font color='#D58E1F'>(+80% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies. 
1 grenade can be restored every 10s, up to 5. Restore time is affected by Cooldown Reduction.

equipments.name: Endless Battle
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Divine Justice:After using a skill, the next Basic Attack will deal extra 85% of Physical Attack as True Damage. This effect has a CD of 1.5s.
Unique Passive-Chase Fate:When Divine Justice's effect is triggered, it will increase the hero's movement speed 10%.

equipments.name: Berserker's Fury
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Doom:Crit hit will increase the hero's Physical Attack by 5% for 2s.

equipments.name: Rose Gold Meteor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Lifeline:Success

equipments.name: Malefic Roar
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Armor Buster:Basic Attack will ignore 20% of a Turret's Defense.

equipments.name: Blade of Despair
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

hero.name: Bruno
hero.head: miya/hero/head/8fbb62ba98a0a4a9189adde8cc584d61.png
hero.tale:
Growing up in the slums, Bruno was always thinner than his peers. These circumstances never stopped him from having a heart filled with freedom. However, during a tragic accident, Bruno lost his two legs while saving the life of his partner. Sadly, this event caused Bruno to lose all hope in life. 

The scholars of Antoinerei heard of Bruno's inspiring story and commended him for his bravery. Empathized with his tragedy and out of strong compassion, the scholars used the City's latest technology to create synthetic legs for Bruno. When Bruno took his first step he was shocked by the strange feeling of his synthetic legs but was amazed by how running felt like flying.

To express his gratitude, Bruno vowed to protect Antoinerei till the day he dies. The elated City's scholars quickly developed an energy ball as Bruno's main weapon, specifically to be used with his synthetic legs. From that day forward, any invader who set foot in Antoinerei was met by Bruno's relentless attack. The city people came to call him, "The Protector of Antoinerei".

skills.name: Mecha Legs
skills.des:
Each time Bruno's skill causes damage, his Crit Chance will be increased by 2%. Stacks up to 10 times.
Since <font color='#404495'>("Mecha Legs")</font> are infused with power, Bruno can deal more damage, but the extra ATK Speed only takes effect by 80%.

skills.name: Volley Shot
skills.des:
Bruno infuses the power to his Mecha Legs, his next Basic Attack will kick a powerball directly and hit an enemy target, dealing 95<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and slowing the target by 30% for 0.5s.
The powerball can be rebounded to Bruno when hitting the target. Bruno or his teammates can pick up the energy ball to reduce the CD of <font color='#404495'>("Flying Tackle")</font> by 1s and Bruno will have powerball again.

skills.name: Flying Tackle
skills.des:
Bruno makes a forward slide tackle, dealing 140<font color='#D58E1F'>(+40% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies and stunning them for 0.5s.
If Bruno casts Flying Tackle while there is a powerball rebounding to him, he will pull back this powerball immediately.

skills.name: Wave of the World
skills.des: Bruno kicks an energy ball at a designated hero, dealing 250<font color='#D58E1F'>(+83% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>, knocking back the target and reducing Physical Defense of the target by 3. Afterwards the energy ball will ricochet among enemy heroes (Up to 10 times). Every hit deals 150<font color='#D58E1F'>(+50% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. Physical Defense Reducing effect lasts 8s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equipments.name: Haas's Claws
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Insanity:When HP drops below 40%, the hero will receive extra 10% Physical Lifesteal.

equipments.name: Windtalker
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Typhoon:Every 5s, Basic Attack hits 3 enemy units and deals 150 points of [C3Magic Damage]. This effect's CD drops as your Crit Chance rises, while damage rises as Attack Speed rises. (Deals 100% more Damage to Minions.)
Unique Passive-Activate:Each time Typhoon is cast, one's movement speed will be increased 5% for a short time.

equipments.name: Berserker's Fury
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Doom:Crit hit will increase the hero's Physical Attack by 5% for 2s.

equipments.name: Malefic Roar
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Armor Buster:Basic Attack will ignore 20% of a Turret's Defense.

equipments.name: Rose Gold Meteor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Lifeline:Success

hero.name: Bane
hero.head: miya/hero/head/8043ee596181eac9d437a536d4f0187d.png
hero.tale: Many years ago, Captain Bane and his fleet were invincible, and even the fiercest of pirates knew him to be the one true ruler of the seven seas. Now, he has awakened from the depths of the ocean, his body cursed and his Black Pearl in ruins, hell-bent on showing the world that he is still the overlord of the high seas!

skills.name: Shark Bite
skills.des:
Bane's weapon is infused with Tidal Energy every 10s. Damage of his next basic attack is increased by 60% to 90% and deals extra splash damage to nearby enemies. 
Hitting an enemy hero with skills will decrease the infusion time of Tidal Energy by 2.5s. Hitting non-hero units will decrease the infusion time of Tidal Energy by 1s.

skills.name: Crab Claw Cannon
skills.des:
Bane fires a Crab Claw Cannon in a designated direction, dealing 180<font color='#D58E1F'>(+140% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the first target hit. Then the Cannon will rebound to an enemy unit randomly, dealing 150% damage of this skill.(Attack enemy heroes first)
If Bane uses Crab Claw Cannon and kills the target, Bounce Damage will be increased by <Num3%>.

skills.name: Rum
skills.des:
Bane takes a sip of rum, immediately regenerating 260<font color='#27C0C7'>(+200% Magic Power)</font> points of HP and increasing his Movement Speed by 30%. Lasts 2.5s.
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again)</font>: Bane can then spit venom forward in a fan-shaped area, dealing 100<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Total Physical ATK)</font> to 200<font color='#D58E1F'>(+200% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font>. The longer the venom is brewed, the more damage it will deal.

skills.name: Deadly Catch
skills.des: Bane summons a school of sharks to move to a designated location. When they hit enemies, they will deal 500<font color='#D58E1F'>(+160% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and decrease Movement Speed by 30% and Attack Speed by 50%. Lasts 3s. Deals 40% of damage to Turrets.

equipments.name: Blade of the Heptaseas
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Ambush:Next Basic Attack will deal extra Physical Damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack if no damage taken or dealt within 5s.

equipments.name: Hunter Strike
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Retribution:Deals damage to an enemy hero or Creep for 5 times in a row and improves Movement Speed by 30% for 3s. This effect has a CD of 15s.

equipments.name: Malefic Roar
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Armor Buster:Basic Attack will ignore 20% of a Turret's Defense.

equipments.name: Blade of Despair
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

hero.name: Franco
hero.head: miya/hero/head/126b19b94d816f4ba5f957948d9457a9.png
hero.tale: Franco's home is in the eternally frozen seas beyond the land of Northern Vale. This continent of ice and snow is where the sea people have made a life for themselves, but the resurrection of Captain Bane has destroyed their formerly peaceful lives. Franco and his comrades have banded together to oppose Bane's rule and bring peace back to the seas.

skills.name: Wasteland Force
skills.des: Franco increases Movement Speed by 10% and regens 1% of Max HP per second if he takes no damage for a short time.

skills.name: Iron Hook
skills.des: Franco launches an iron hook to a designated direction. The hook will snag the first unit, and dealing 550<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and dragging the unit back to Franco.

skills.name: Fury Shock
skills.des: Franco lashes out, dealing <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> equal to 300 plus 4% of his Max HP to nearby enemies and slowing them by 70% for 1.5s.

skills.name: Bloody Hunt
skills.des: Franco suppresses a designated enemy unit for 1.8s, and then hacks them for 6 times continuously, dealing 60<font color='#D58E1F'>(+70% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> with each hack.

equipments.name: Shadow Mask
skill_tips: Active Skill-Conceal: Conceals you and your teammates nearby and increases Movement SPD by 15% for 5s. Dealing or taking damage will end the state. Cooldown: 80s. This effect prevents hero from benefiting from Conceal and Encourage again in 80s.

Unique Passive-Devotion:Obtain 2 EXP and Gold every 4s. In the first 12 minutes of the match, this equipment makes you gain nothing from Minions or Creeps if there are teammates without Roaming Equipment, or those with but have higher EXP or Gold than yours around you. They will share the whole EXP or Gold.

Unique Passive-Thriving:Gains extra 35% Gold and EXP with Assists. When your Gold ranks the 5th in your team, increase Gold you gain to 20 per 4s. When your EXP ranks the 5th in your team, increase EXP you gain to 35 per 4s.

equipments.name: Dominance Ice
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Arctic Cold:Lowers movement speed 10% and lowers attack speed 30% for nearby enemy heroes.

equipments.name: Oracle
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Bless:Raises shield absorption and HP regeneration effects by 30%.

equipments.name: Antique Cuirass
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Success:Success

equipments.name: Guardian Helmet
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Recovery:Regenerates 1.5% of hero's Max HP. Eliminating enemy heroes raises regeneration rate by 0.4%, while assists raises the rate by 0.2% (includes eliminations and Assists prior to purchase), up to 3.5%. This effect wears off after 5s of the hero taking damage.

hero.name: Akai
hero.head: miya/hero/head/99c0cd61f4e50c2501acc76366a520e7.png
hero.tale:
A clumsy panda from a far away Eastern village dreamt every night of becoming a mighty warrior. Akai was fat and clumsy even for panda standards and most people said that all he's good for was rolling round. 

However, this never fazed Akai, as he trained daily, hoping to one day achieve his dreams of becoming a respected warrior. His friends mocked him, his parents discouraged him but Akai persisted. Soon one day, a mysterious old monk noticed Akai's persistence and took him under his guidance. Akai flourished under the training of the monk, mastering the arts of the flail. 

He is now ready to get onto the world stage and prove that he is a worthy member of the martial arts world!

skills.name: Tai Chi

skills.des: Akai jumps towards a designated location. Upon landing, he deals 300<font color='#D58E1F'>(+50% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemy units, and slows them by 30% for 2s. When Akai deals damage to enemies marked with <font color='#404495'>("Blender")</font>, they will get stunned for extra 1s.

skills.name: Blender
skills.des:
Akai fires a frog-shaped wave in the designated direction. The wave explodes upon hitting enemies or once it reaches its Max range, dealing 350<font color='#D58E1F'>(+120% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies and marking them for 5s. 
Akai's Basic Attack on marked targets deals extra 5% <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> of Akai's Max HP.

skills.name: Hurricane Dance
skills.des:
Akai spins like a tornado for 3.5s and knocks back the surrounding enemies, dealing 180<font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> (Damage decays against the same target). 
Using this skill removes all Debuffs from Akai immediately. He also becomes immune to Slowing Effect in the duration and increases 30 points of his Movement Speed.

equipments.name: Twilight Armor

hero.name: Karina
hero.head: miya/hero/head/2740050ce09a64eeb05213356f7132c2.png
hero.tale:
The ancestors of the Dark Elves were once noble Moon Elves, but the temptation of dark magic eventually subverted them, causing them to abandon their faith. The Moon Elves who turned their backs on the light lost the blessing of the Moon God, and were gradually eroded from within by dark energy, with their skin becoming ashen and devoid of light. The Dark Elves, who make a living by providing assassination services for other races, are born assassins able to use dark energy with ease. 

Karina is one of the best among them, and her assassination tasks were always carried out to perfection. But as the Dark Elves sank deeper into the clutches of darkness, the most fanatical of them even sacrificed their own people to the demons of the Shadow Abyss in exchange for dark energy. As Karina watched these events transpire, she became filled with anxiety and confusion, and when her beloved sister, Selena, was chosen as the next sacrifice, Karina decided she could no longer stand idly by. She would never allow the demons to hurt her sister. 

She fought off her own people with her twin shadow blades, but even Karina could not resist the siege of the Dark Elves. Beaten to the brink of death, Karina watched as her sister was taken away by the envoys of the Shadow Abyss. Powerless, she felt her vision gradually blurring as her younger sister's cries became more and more distant. Sorrow and despair filled Karina's heart. She prayed to all the gods she knew of, but to no avail. The Dark Elves raised their swords to end Karina's life, but were shocked to discover a dim blue glow radiating from the twin shadow blades in her hands. 

Although they had abandoned him for thousands of years, the Mood God still watched over the Elves, and granted Karina his blessing in her time of need. The Dark Elves could not believe what was happening before their eyes, and they chose to flee. A soft and gentle power trickled down from Karina's twin blades and into her body, dissipating the dark energy within her and healing her wounds. Karina stood up and vowed to turn from her dark past. From that day on, and enraged by the pain of losing her sister, no demon would escape the retribution of her moonshadow blades.

skills.name: Combo Hit
skills.des: After attacking a target twice continuously, Karina's third attack will deal extra <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font> to the target that equals to 10% of enemy's lost HP.

skills.name: Elusiveness
skills.des:
Karina enters Elusiveness State for 3s, becoming immune to all Basic Attacks and speeding up by 35%. Her next Basic Attack will let her cast off Elusiveness State and deal extra 160<font color='#27C0C7'>(+55% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> with Crit Damage. Target will be slowed by 40%. Lasts 2s. 
Kills or Assists will reduce this skill's CD by 60%.

skills.name: Dance of Death
skills.des:
Karina brandishes her double swords, dealing 280<font color='#27C0C7'>(+115% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to surrounding enemies. 
Kills or Assists will reduce this skill's CD by 60%.

skills.name: Shadow Assault
skills.des:
Karina rapidly rushes toward a target, dealing 430<font color='#27C0C7'>(+220% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font>. 
Kills will immediately reset this skill's CD while Assists will reduce the CD by 80%.

equipments.name: Clock of Destiny
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Time:Adds 30 HP and 5 magic attack every 30 seconds. Up to 10 times.
Unique Passive-Reincarnate:If Time reaches Max, then the hero will receive extra 5% Magic Attack and 300 Mana.

equipments.name: Calamity Reaper
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Calamity:After using a skill, the next Basic Attack deals extra True Damage that equals to 120% Magic Attack. CD: 1.5s. Briefly raises Movement Speed by 10%.

equipments.name: Ice Queen Wand
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Ice Bound:Skills that deal damage to an enemy hero will slow them by 15%. This effect lasts 3s. Stacks up to 2 times.

equipments.name: Holy Crystal

equipments.name: Immortality

hero.name: Alucard
hero.head: miya/hero/head/d8eaca5fbdea361d2f203bd772e355ae.png
hero.tale:
Alucard was born in the capital of the empire. His parents were once mentors to Tigreal's Order of Knights. In one of his trials, Tigreal's overconfidence led to Alucard's parents sacrificing their lives in order to save him from demons. Unable to accept this harsh reality, Alucard went into the territory of the demons in order to search for his parents. All he found on the battlefield, however, was the family crest worn on his parents' chest. He was then suddenly ambushed by the demons, who captured and tortured him for months. He was eventually freed by a demon hunter, after which he took up refuge as a resident of the Temple of Light.

Alucard's youth was full of tragedy. During his captivity his mind was consumed with surviving moment to moment, and the rage within his heart was buried. Though he was humiliated countless times by his demon captors, he never gave up his desire for revenge. It was this desire that gave him strength to survive the months of imprisonment. Alucard became drawn to the abilities of the demon hunter who rescued him. Unwilling to return to the Order of Imperial Knights that him feel nothing but sadness, he went with the demon hunter to the Temple of Light. He trained there for many years, becoming an exceptional demon hunter himself. He spent his days researching how to better hunt and kill demons. Holding nothing but hate for demons in his heart, he follows the three principles of the demon hunters: independence from all organizations and territories; no mercy for even a single demon; and no "last" missions. The most mysterious things about him are the demonic claws on his right hand as nobody knows what they are or how they got there

skills.name: Pursuit
skills.des: If Alucard's skill hits only 1 enemy, it deals 1.2x damage. If it hits 2 enemies, it deals 1.1x damage. Alucard's next Basic Attack after using any skill deals 1.2x damage and takes him to the target.

skills.name: Groundsplitter
skills.des: Alucard jumps to a designated location and leaps forward to launch strikes, dealing 240<font color='#D58E1F'>(+160% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and slowing enemies by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Whirling Smash
skills.des: Alucard slashes at nearby enemies, dealing 230<font color='#D58E1F'>(+140% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.

skills.name: Fission Wave
skills.des: Alucard increases his Physical Lifesteal by 20% and locks onto an enemy. Meanwhile, his Lifesteal Effect increases by 100%. Lasts 8s. During the time, he can fire a powerful attack wave forward, dealing 440<font color='#D58E1F'>(+220% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies.

equipments.name: Haas's Claws
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Insanity:When HP drops below 40%, the hero will receive extra 10% Physical Lifesteal.

equipments.name: Warrior Boots
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Valor:Physical defense will go up 5 with each basic attack received, for an increase of up to 25 points. Lasts 3 seconds.

equipments.name: Endless Battle

Unique Passive-Chase Fate:When Divine Justice's effect is triggered, it will increase the hero's movement speed 10%.

equipments.name: Queen's Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Demonize:Reduces damage taken by 50% when health is less than 40% and increases your Physical Lifesteal by 30%. Lasts 5 seconds. This effect has a 50 second cooldown.

equipments.name: Immortality

equipments.name: Blade of Despair
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Despair:Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)

hero.name: Tigreal
hero.head: miya/hero/head/104efbe417b24b1177dc6920c235cab8.png
hero.tale:
Tigreal is the Captain of the Moniyan Knights’ Order of the Imperial Empire. Even as a child, he wanted nothing more than to become a great knight of the Empire. Since his youth, Tigreal was a loyal believer in the Lord of Light. He swore to become a member of the Knight's Order to defend the status and symbol of the Moniyan Empire throughout the Land of Dawn. He dedicated all his time to training. In each of their training simulations and tests Tigreal's performance became the benchmark that no other knight's could surpass. His mentors were the most revered of all the Imperial Knights. In order to prove himself and surpass them, he dedicated more time and energy than others to his betterment; even the smallest mistakes in his training would be corrected and practiced repeatedly in his free time. Eventually, his mentors declared him the Captain with the highest potential in all of the Knight's Order.

His mentors' comments gave Tigreal complete confidence in his abilities. Even the strongest of heroes, however, is not without weakness. While hunting demons during one of their trial missions Tigreal showed the slightest amount of compassion, hesitating to make a kill. In that moment of hesitation, he was ambushed by the demons and was gravely injured. He watched helplessly as his mentors sacrificed themselves to save him. It was this mission that made Tigreal understand that he still had a long path ahead of him if he wanted his name to be recorded in the history of the land, . After the returning to the empire, Tigreal became even more strict with himself. He required each of his men to come back from every mission without a single loss, and wouldn't tolerate a single mistake from any of his subordinates.

Ever since then the Paladin Tigreal can be seen at the frontlines of the battle, where he has never been defeated. Even the most evil of enemies didn’t dare to provoke Tigreal in battle, because they knew to do so would be to suffer his merciless assault. A staunch believer in the Lord of Light, he became a pillar of the Knights’ Order, and his name synonymous with bravery and fearlessness. In order to recognize his courage, the empire bestowed upon him the title of Warrior of Dawn.

Tigreal constantly sought out the bravest warriors of the land, and in his mind there was none better than Alucard. For a long time, however, he has been unable to convince Alucard to leave the Temple of Light and join him. He knows that Alucard was unable to move on from the death of his parents. Each time he walked up the steps to the Temple of Light, he did so with a heart full of regret.

skills.name: Fearless
skills.des: Tigreal gains a layer of blessing when using skills or being hit by Basic Attacks (Those from minions are excluded). He gains immunity to the next Basic Attack after gaining 4 layers in total (Those from minions are excluded).

skills.name: Attack Wave
skills.des: Tigreal fires an attack wave in a designated direction, dealing 300<font color='#D58E1F'>(+80% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies and slowing them by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Sacred Hammer
skills.des:
Tigreal charges in a specified direction and collides with enemies, dealing <font color='#D58E1F'>(+100% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. 
4s after the charge, Tigreal can use the skill again to launch a second attack, dealing 280<font color='#D58E1F'>(+60% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and knocking enemies into the air for 1s.

skills.name: Implosion
skills.des: Tigreal thrusts his sword into the earth, pulling surrounding enemies to himself. Then he deals 270<font color='#D58E1F'>(+130% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to them and stuns them for 1.5s. (This skill can be interrupted by transformation and airborne effects.)
