hero.name: Nana
hero.head: miya/hero/head/ef5c7187c7022c4457ca08588327c0b1.png
hero.tale:
The Moon Elves are not the only race to call the Enchanted Forest home. A race of cat-like elves, the Leonins, also live in the forest. Cute, friendly and uninvolved in the conflicts of the world, they are the loyal preservers of the Enchanted Forest who make the area the fairyland paradise that it is. As the most ancient race of the Enchanted Forest, they possess a strong natural talent for all things magical.

Nana is special among the Leonins. With a bright personality and love of adventure, she is full of curiosity for all things new and hopes to one day leave her home and see the world.

But Nana also has a mischievous side that often causes trouble for those around her. She is naturally gifted with strong magical abilities, but doesn't know how to control them. The most serious time she lost control of her impressive abilities resulted in the destruction of almost half the forest. In order to protect the Leonins from her uncontrollable magic abilities, Nana decided to leave her home. In her travels she met a Moon Elf named Miya who suppressed Nana's magic abilities and then taught her the Moon Elves’ secret to control magical energies. The intelligent Nana quickly mastered the technique and became a powerful witch of the Leonin clan. She chose to follow Miya to the Land of Dawn in search for the new King.

skills.name: Molina's Gift
skills.des: Molina's blessings will transform Nana for 2s when she takes a deadly damage. Within this duration, Nana is immune to all damage and her Movement Speed increases by 70%. Under transformed state Nana recovers 10% of her Max HP but she can't use skills. The blessings activate every 120s.

skills.name: Magic Boomerang
skills.des: Nana launches a magic boomerang in the designated direction. Each time the boomerang hits an enemy, it will deal 200<font color='#27C0C7'>(+100% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> and slow enemies by 40% for 1s. The first enemy takes full damage, the next one takes 20% less damage, up to 60% less damage.

skills.name: Molina Smooch
skills.des: Nana summons Molina to the designated area. After a short delay, Molina locks onto an enemy hero, chases them, and morphs them, dealing 250<font color='#27C0C7'>(+50% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> and slowing them by 50% for 1.5s. Reduces Magic Defense of transformed heroes by 25%.

skills.name: Molina Blitz
skills.des: Nana summons Molina to attack the designated area 3 times. Each attack deals 400<font color='#27C0C7'>(+180% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in the area and slows them by 50% for 2s. If Molina Blitz hits a single enemy continuously, that enemy will be stunned for 1s.

equipments.name: Enchanted Talisman
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mana Spring:Regenerates 12% of Max Mana every 10s in total.

equipments.name: Holy Crystal
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mystery:Increases Magic Attack by 21%~35% (Scales with level).

equipments.name: Divine Glaive
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Spellbreaker:When HP is higher than 70%, the unique bonus effect is increased by 30%

equipments.name: Ice Queen Wand
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Ice Bound:Skills that deal damage to an enemy hero will slow them by 15%. This effect lasts 3s. Stacks up to 2 times.

equipments.name: Concentrated Energy
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Recharge:Kill enemy hero to recover HP by 10%.

hero.name: Alice
hero.head: miya/hero/head/a5a3bac10a45e797602cb96ac28dc9b6.png
hero.tale:
Thousands of years ago, the Enchanted Forest in the Land of Dawn was inhabited by the Moon Elves. Underneath the surface of beauty and magic, there lay hidden great danger. Strange black shadows appeared near the forest that the Moon Elves’ home, and with their haunting presence the Moon Elves’ numbers began to shrink.

The Blood Demons are a race that drains the life force of others in order to maintain their own bodies, and the peace-loving Moon Elves had become their favorite prey. Estes, the Moon Elf King, battled against the Blood Demons in order to protect his people. But after Alice, the Blood Demon Queen, conquered the Orcs, her demonic reach extended even further into the Enchanted Forest. She hoped to acquire the power of the Moon Elves and Estes for herself, just as she did with the Orcs. Her strong ambition led her to repeatedly invade the Lake of the Moon God. Every time, she was beaten back by the formidable will of King Estes. Not willing to resign to defeat, Alice decided to lead her mutant Orcs in another attack against the Moon Elves. Near the end of the battle, King Estes gathered his full might and landed a heavy blow against Alice, greatly wounding the Blood Demon Queen. Though the battle had ended, the heavily injured Moon Elf King entered into a great sleep in the deep of the Enchanted Forest.

Today, the appearance of the Twilight Orb has plunged the Land of Dawn into chaos once more. In the cracks of the abyss deep within the earth, the Abyssal Ruler thirsts for more followers to believe in him. His dark shadow has silently spread over the mountains of the South, and Alice has found strength in pledging herself to this power. Though she has not fully recovered her former strength, gaining the trust of the Abyssal Ruler has caused her former ambitions to rekindle. In order to more quickly to become whole again, she continues to drain the life force of all beings she meets; with the naive, newborn Moon Elves being her favorite prey. After achieving this temporary satisfaction, Alice has turned her eye towards a larger prey: the heroes from the Alt-World. "Watch your back."

skills.name: Blood Ancestry
skills.des: When a nearby Minion dies, it generates a blood orb. Each blood orb Alice absorbs will permanently increase her Max HP by 10. After absorbing 12/25/50 blood orbs, she will receive permanently 10% CD Reduction/10% Magic Lifesteal/40 Movement Speed.

skills.name: Flowing Blood
skills.des:
Alice casts Blood Stream in the designated direction, dealing 350<font color='#27C0C7'>(+180% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies. 
Using this skill again to immediately teleport to the Stream's location.

skills.name: Blood Awe
skills.des: Alice deals 270<font color='#27C0C7'>(+90% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to nearby enemies, immobilizing them for 1.2s. Enemies will be slowed by 70% after the immobilization. Lasts 0.8s.

skills.name: Blood Ode
skills.des: Alice enters the blood-sucking state for 5s, dealing 160<font color='#27C0C7'>(+70% Total Magic Power)</font> points of <font color='#341C9D'>(Magic Damage)</font> to surrounding enemies every 0.5s while restoring 80<font color='#27C0C7'>(+30% Total Magic Power)</font> HP for herself. If the target is non-hero unit, she restores 50% of HP.

equipments.name: Clock of Destiny
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Time:Adds 30 HP and 5 magic attack every 30 seconds. Up to 10 times.
Unique Passive-Reincarnate:If Time reaches Max, then the hero will receive extra 5% Magic Attack and 300 Mana.

equipments.name: Demon Shoes
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Mysticism:Eliminations of enemy heroes and assists regenerates hero’s mana by 10%, while eliminating minions regenerates 4% of the hero’s mana.

equipments.name: Concentrated Energy
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Recharge:Kill enemy hero to recover HP by 10%.

equipments.name: Oracle
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Bless:Raises shield absorption and HP regeneration effects by 30%.

equipments.name: Ice Queen Wand
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Ice Bound:Skills that deal damage to an enemy hero will slow them by 15%. This effect lasts 3s. Stacks up to 2 times.

equipments.name: Blood Wings
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Nirvana:Adds 1.5 HP for every 1 pt of magic power added.

hero.name: Saber
hero.head: miya/hero/head/f7d55f7adf7f91fbc060610a3031a2cf.png
hero.tale:
The birth of Saber traces back to the early years of Laboratory 1718. In the beginning, he was a scholar in one of the most famous invention teams in Scholar City. Dr. Rooney hoped that this team would be able to unlock the ultimate potential of mechanical invention and lead the world into a glorious age of technology. But the radically intellectual scientists became more and more obsessed with modifications to the human body. They engaged in insane experiments that ignored the limits of the human body. They were willing to try anything, use any combination of technology and power, so long as it enhanced human abilities that had not yet been unlocked by nature. Because of this, Dr. Rooney was forced to disband this team and banished the scientists.

Though they had lost Dr. Rooney's favor, the scientists did not abandon their dreams. They established a laboratory of their own, a symbol of the reverence they held for their inventions. Laboratory 1718 was thus born, and it gathered radical scientists from all parts of the world to conduct strict and rigorous experiments on its subjects with the goal of creating stronger, and ever more advanced human weapons. The scientists gathered the genes of hundreds of sword masters of all different races, combining them with cutting-edge technology to create the first artificial man. As Laboratory 1718's first creation, they named him Saber.

Saber's personality was proud and aloof, the sword he wielded was capable of cutting space-time itself. With his sword he traveled between the dimensions, his skill unmatched by any enemy he encountered. And because of this, Saber was extremely lonely. When he returned back to Laboratory 1718 to repair himself after each battle, he was no longer able to remember who his opponent was. This realization caused him to become curious about the origins of his creation. He also began to wonder about his true identity; another question he was unable to answer at Laboratory 1718, where all he did was submit to his battle instincts as he completed missions. Gradually, he grew tired of such an existence and decided to break free from Laboratory 1718's control to travel to the Land of Dawn, where he hoped to find answers through endless battles.

skills.name: Enemy's Bane
skills.des: Saber's damage reduces Physical Defense of enemies by 7 points. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 5s.

skills.name: Flying Sword
skills.des:
Saber shoots out 4 flying swords, with each sword dealing up to 160<font color='#D58E1F'>(+90% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. Swords will spin around for a while and then fly back to Saber. 
Using <font color='#404495'>("Charge")</font> will call the swords back earlier. Swords also deal damage if they hit an enemy on their way back. This skill enjoys only 40% of Spell Vamp.

skills.name: Charge
skills.des: Saber charges towards a designated place, dealing 80<font color='#D58E1F'>(+40% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies along the way.

skills.name: Triple Sweep
skills.des: Saber attacks an enemy hero, knocking the target into the air for 1.2s, and then dealing 3 blows continuously. Each blow deals 200<font color='#D58E1F'>(+130% Extra Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.

equipments.name: Blade of the Heptaseas
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Ambush:Next Basic Attack will deal extra Physical Damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack if no damage taken or dealt within 5s.

equipments.name: Rose Gold Meteor
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Lifeline:Success

equipments.name: Malefic Roar
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Armor Buster:Basic Attack will ignore 20% of a Turret's Defense.

equipments.name: Immortality
skill_tips: Unique Passive-Immortal:Resurrect 2s upon death and get 15% HP and a shield that can absorb 300~1000 points of damage. (Scales with hero level) Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a CD of 180s.

hero.name: Balmond
hero.head: miya/hero/head/116176a58bd791e772eddab6c660efa6.png
hero.tale:
In the Land of Dawn, from the Enchanted Forest to the Crack of the Abyss, the Blood Demons used their noble bloodline and extreme intelligence to enslave the Orcs whom were symbols of barbaric strength. The Orcs were in servitude to the Blood Demons and in addition to searching for their own food, the enslaved Orcs were also tasked with hunting for a very special food for their masters: Moon Elves.

The Orcs suffered greatly during their 30 years of enslavement, and their great ancestor, the Crazed Savage, hoped for an early end to their slavery. The Orcs had organized rebellions against the Blood Demon rule in the past, but each time they were unsuccessful and were met with death and destruction. It was during one of the larger of these rebellions that the rebel leader's wife lost her life giving birth to Balmond. Balmond was raised by his father and their Orc clan. The unusual circumstances of his childhood led him to grow up with a violent temper and a love of battle. He achieved victories in all of his battles against the Moon Elves and Humans, and many became hopeful that he would continue in his father's legacy and eventually command the Orc army.

Growing fiercer with each battle, Balmond became the strongest warrior in the Orc tribe. Years later, after his father had grown old and was near death, he told Balmond of his mother's tragic death. This caused Balmond to be even more determined to free his people from enslavement at the hands of the Blood Demons. Balmond led his Orc tribe in a night assault against the Blood Demon's main camp. He hoped to defeat the Blood Demon leader, Alice, and thereby break the contract of enslavement between them. The Blood Demons, however, proved to be too strong for Balmond. In a moment of desperation, Balmond decided to bite one of the Blood Demons to suck their blood to acquire their special strength. The few Orcs remaining followed Balmond and grew stronger as the strength of the Blood Demons fused with their own. With his new power, Balmond swung his bloody axe and slaughtered all the Blood Demons before him. Alice knew that he was no longer an ordinary Orc, but a hybrid creature that would come to be known as the Bloodaxe Orc. Alice smirked as Balmond approached with his axe raised in preparation of her slaughter. Alice showed no fear even as it swung down, preparing to sever her head from her body. The axe was stopped by a mysterious power just as it was about to meet Alice's skull. It was then that Balmond realized that by acquiring the power of the Blood Demons he had become subjected to Alice's control - denying him and his people the freedom they longed for.

Even today these events still weigh heavy on Balmond's heart. He never intended to become an orc hybrid, and now unable to escape Alice's control. The Blood Demons have become more powerful than ever with this new unholy blood alliance. Every time the Blood Demons summon Balmond, he would be forced to honor the contract. Unable to bend the will of his masters, Balmond suffers in solitude in his own prison until he is summoned by the Blood Demons where his Blood Axe reigns supreme.

skills.name: Bloodthirst
skills.des: Balmond recovers 4% of his Max HP upon killing Minions, and recovers 10% when killing enemy heroes.

skills.name: Lethal Counter
skills.des: Balmond raises a giant axe, dealing 350<font color='#D58E1F'>(+50% Total Physical ATK)</font> plus 20% <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font> of the target's lost HP to enemies in a fan-shaped area in front of him, and slowing them by 40% for 2s. Deals up to 1300 points of damage to non-hero units.

hero.name: Miya
hero.head: miya/hero/head/c089ed5d3fe3ecaef080cdbe8a90d1e7.png
hero.tale:
Miya was born in the Temple of the Moon and studied hard to one day become the next Moon God. 

When the fires of war between Humans and Orcs engulfed the Moon Elves, the Moon Elf Hero Miya took a stand and led her fellow Moon Elves to resist the invasion. Despite their best efforts, Miya and her fellow elves were forced to make a last stand in the temple against the enemy. 

Miya knelt in the center of the temple to pray for one last time when all hope was lost.Then, a miracle occurred. The Moon God answered Miya's prayer and blessed her longbow with an ancient power. Miya grasped the newly endowed bow and fired an arrow, and with the power of the stars,turned into an eagle spirit and caused the enemy into chao. 

Miya led her people out of the temple, raining showers of star-wrought arrows upon the enemy with each pull of her bow. Meanwhile the magical eagle hovered over the enemy, singling them out and attacking them. Like a falling tide, the humans and orcs quickly started to retreat. Miya and her countrymen retook the shores of the Moon God, and the moon elves recognized Miya and her spirit eagle as the Moon God incarnated. 

The young Miya knew in her heart that if this problem was not stopped at the root, the wars would never end. With the Moon God's blessing, she set out on a journey to the land of dawn, hoping to find a king who could bring peace and order back to this world.

skills.name: Turbo
skills.des: Each time Miya's Basic Attack hits a target, her Attack Speed will be increased by 5%. Stacks up to 8 times. Lasts 4s.

skills.name: Fission Shot
skills.des: Miya splits her Basic Attack into two arrows, dealing 5<font color='#D58E1F'>(+105% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to a main target and 30% <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to others. Lasts 4s. Her Basic Attack splits only once.

skills.name: Rain of Arrows
skills.des:
Miya shoots a barrage of arrows towards a designated area, dealing 5 hits of damage to enemies. Each hit deals 30<font color='#D58E1F'>(+15% Total Physical ATK)</font> points of <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and slows enemies by 30% for 2s. 
Enemies who are hit by 4 times of Rain of Arrows will be frozen for 1s.

skills.name: Turbo Stealth
skills.des: Miya removes all her Debuffs and conceals for 1.5s with her Movement Speed increased by 45%. Meanwhile, her Attack Speed is increased by 35% for 6s.
